Job Description:
** About the Role
As an Electrical Engineer in our company, your role would include but not limited to the following:
- Creation of detailed specification and scope of work packs for equipment suppliers.
- Having a structured approach to engineering with regards to project costs and timelines/schedules.
- Preparation of project reports by collecting and analysing information and data.
- Preparation of project documentation.
- Liaising with our clients.
- Ability to travel to site from time to time for commissioning purposes.
Job Requirement:
** Our minimum requirements for this role are:
- Degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent.
- Minimum of 3 years in electrical engineering field.
- Excellent time management skills, setting priorities, planning and organizing.
- Proactively seeking to enhance personal and professional development.
- Self-motivated with positive and friendly attitude.
- Apply initiative to solve task or problems that arise.

** Contacts us on:
Email: Sopheakkimmr@gmail.com
Company Profile:
Designplus is seeking for a talented individual with two (2) years experience to work in a dynamic and creative Team environment. Candidate will have an opportunity to work on a hotel or high rise range of projects from both public and private sectors including residential, multi-family, parks, commercial space  

Designplus is known for our creativeness on architecture, interior and landscape architecture, we also provide a consultant for business planning. The Candidate should have two to four years working experience and be proficient in AutoCAD, Word, Power Point, Sketch up (desirable) and Photoshop. The Candidate should also be effective in written, graphic and spoken communication of all phases of design from exploration to inspiration to implementation. The candidate should know the types of plants species locally 

If interested please email the appropriate resumes and portfolio for review. The Candidate should have at least a degree in Landscape Architecture

job title: មន្រ្តីប្រឹក្សាលក់សេវាហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ (មន្រ្តីឥណទាន) ចំនួន ១៥០នាក់
position: មន្រ្តីប្រឹក្សាលក់សេវាហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ (មន្រ្តីឥណទាន) ចំនួន ១៥០នាក់
Job Description:
-ធ្វើផែនការសកម្មភាព និងផែនការបញ្ចេញឥណទានប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ។
-ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលរបស់អិលអូអិលស៊ីទៅកាន់អតិថិជន និងបើកតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការភូមិថ្មី។
-លក់ផលិតផលផ្សេងៗទៀតក្រៅពីផលិតឥណទានដូចជាសេវាប្រាក់បញ្ញើសន្សំ និងសេវាបង់រំលោះ ។ល។
-គ្រប់គ្រង ថែរក្សាអតិថិជនដែលមានស្រាប់ និងជ្រើសរើសអតិថិជនថ្មី។
-សិក្សាវាយតម្លៃពាក្យស្នើសុំកម្ចី និងឯកសារដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធពីអតិថិជន។
-គ្រប់គ្រងផលបត្រឥណទានឱ្យមានគុណភាពល្អ។
-ពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំពីការប្រើប្រាស់កម្ចី ការសងត្រឡប់ និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំថ្ងៃ/ខែ/ឆ្នាំ។
-ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតទៅតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។
Job Requirement:
-យ៉ាងហោចណាស់មានសញ្ញាបត្រទុតិយភូមិ(បាក់ឌុប) ឬ កំពុងសិក្សាថ្នាក់មហាវិទ្យាល័យគ្រប់ផ្នែក ។
-មានចំណេះដឹង ទាក់ទងទៅនឹងសេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ។
-មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រាក់កម្ចីជាមួយស្ថាប័នមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុនឹងផ្តល់អាទិភាព។
-មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងស្រាវជ្រាវទីផ្សារកាន់តែប្រសើរ។
-ផ្តល់អាទិភាពដល់បេក្ខជន/នារីដែលមានទីលំនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកខាងលើរបស់អិលអូអិលស៊ី។

Company Profile: LOLC (CAMBODIA) PLC. is one of the top licensed microfinance institutions in Cambodia with a social vision and a business orientation that provides entrepreneurs and families at the base of the socio-economic pyramid with economic opportunities to transform the quality of their lives and their communities through the provision of effective and sustainable client-empowering financial services. Currently, LOLC serves more than 234,860 clients with loans outstanding of more than 603 million USD.

Job Description:
- Conduct regular institutional market survey including customer satisfaction, and customer dropout survey. 
- Conduct market demand survey to keep track of the market trends on financial products. 
- Conduct marketing research studies and analyze findings. 
- Conduct feasibility studies on new products and services opportunities. 
- Knowledge on developing research proposal.  
- Conduct monitoring and evaluation on financial services and related projects.
- Conduct microfinance environmental analysis and competition analysis. 
- Assist unit manager in develop and update market research manual 
- Assist in Business Intelligence (BI) analysis. 
- Write research report focus mainly on finding and result to the management. 
- Perform other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
Qualifications and Requirements:

- Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Management, Social Science or equivalent.
- 01 year-experience in marketing research (field research, data collection, analysis), preferably with financial industry.  
- Interviewing skills and capacity to carry out research. 
- High motivation, initiative, willing, and able to travel to field. 
- Good problem solving and analysis skills.
- Good computer literacy (Ms. Office, SPSS and relevant applications) 
- Good command in English is preferred. 
- Ability to work independently. 
- Hard-working and able to work under pressure.

Deadline: Jan 15, 2021

Company Profile: Cambo Technology (I.S.P) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 by a group of experienced business and I.T. executives to offer local clients with computer solutions and broadband internet services.To facilitate more focused business development as an Internet service Provider, the Company changed to its present name in October 2007. With the introduction of state-of-the-art telecom equipment and its own fiber optic network constructed around and within the city of Phnom Penh Cambodia, we are committed to providing quality cost-effective and reliable internet connection to our clients. We provide Hight quality total solution products and services to meet or exceed customers expectation through continue improvement. Cambo Technology’s mission is to become the leading solution provider in Cambodia. Leveraging the strong foundation of information technologies it has built and reinforced over the years. Job Description: -	Develop a marketing strategy in accordance with the overall company goals and vision.-	Plan, direct, coordinate and implement outstanding marketing strategies, advertising and promotional activities.-	Support business department to achieve the target KPIs, projected sales, and marketing objectives.-	Contribute to Business Department in conceptualizing new initiatives to make FCC the top of mind (Think Infertility, Think FCC) amongst potential patients/customers, and referral partners.-	Conduct direct marketing activities (such as emailing, phone calls or SMS) with prospects and stakeholders to gain significant improvement and desired results in the business.-	Oversee the production of all marketing materials, including printed documents, media advertising spots, website content, and social media accounts as well as run marketing campaigns through various social media platforms.-	Monitor competitor activity and brainstorm potential improvements or changes in marketing strategies, products, or services.-	Track changes in client engagement following the roll-out of each marketing campaign.-	Report on Return on Investment and key performance metrics in each marketing and promotional activities.-	Collaborate with other departments and team in the clinic to obtain collaboration, information, and targeted improvement.-	Remain up-to-date in Social media use to mobilize marketing campaign.-	Identify, explore, and build relations with various key stakeholders in the field to build networks, strategic marketing opportunities, and referral connections.-	Liaise relationship and communications with the media and wider communities as well as to attend marketing conference / workshop as required.-	Other related marketing and sales tasks assigned by head of the department.
Job Requirement: -	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or other related fields.-	At least 3 years of excellence experiences preferably in hospital, clinics, healthcare industry, orsimilar marketing settings.-	Being honest, team player, initiative, friendly, fresh service oriented and commit to work under pressure.-	Good command of both spoken and written Khmer and English.-	Computer proficiency in Office applications, creative design applications.-	Good interpersonal communication, presentation and client relationships management.-	Good planning, research and analysis skills.

Job Description:
•Be involved and participate in the overall application lifecycle
•Main focus on coding and debugging
•Help improve our code quality through writing unit tests, automation and performing code reviews.
•Collaborate with multidisciplinary team of Back-End Software Engineers, Project Managers and System Administrators.
•Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms and products.
•Define and communicate technical and design requirements
•Build high-quality reusable code that can be used in threw future
•Develop functional and sustainable web applications with clean codes
•Troubleshoot and debug applications
•Stay up to date with current best practices
•Conduct UI tests and optimize performance
•Participate in conferences and educational programs
•Follow new and emerging technologies
•Building web applications using the Laravel framework (8.x), particularly PHP-based applications using Composer-based frameworks 
•Produce “clean” and well-structured code, with detailed specifications 
•Collaborate with the team in all phases of the development lifecycle 
•Managing source code using git 
•Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality 
•Design and implement new features to facilitate related procedures and tools if necessary 
•Stay informed about industry best practices
Job Requirement:
•At least 2+ Years’ experience of working on a PHP Developer position
•3 - 5 years backend software development 
•Agile SDLC oriented
•Expertise with PHP 7.x 
•Solid experience with of web technologies including HTML, CSS, Java script, MySQL, and so on 
•Excellent knowledge of relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services 
•Knowledgeable about Composer, npm, and package management procedures 
•Experience building and interacting with RESTful APIs 
•Comfortable with the concepts and creation of automated tests (TDD, integration testing, etc.

Job Description:
Presently, we are seeking qualified candidates to fill up the vacant positions
in our Luxury Division as following:

Sales Supervisor: 2 positions


Job Responsibilities

-Responsible for developing business in responsible market segment
-Report market situation and competitors’ activities to the sales manager
-Build a good relationship with customers for long business relation
-Build up a good brand image of the company and product in the market
-Attending team meeting and contributing to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
-Reviewing own sales performance, aiming to meet or exceed targeted results
-Perform any other tasks assigned by the manager
Job Requirement:
-All candidates should be able to speak/write a second language, either English or Chinese,
in addition of Khmer
-All candidates should have at least two years of experiences in sales and a relevant Degree of Business Administration/Development, Business, Sales & Negotiation, Customer Relationship or related
-All candidates must have excellent interpersonal and communication skills both oral and written
-All Candidates must possess organization and time management skills with demonstrated ability
to follow the sales process
-Experience in the automotive industry
is preferable as well as experience in luxury customer relationship
-Experienced candidates can come from any industry but sales and customer service profiles
have priority to apply for the available positions
-Candidates with small experience BUT with genuine interest for the Automotive industry and willing to commit are welcome to apply
-Able to use computer literate (Ms. Words, Ms. Excel, Internet & E-mail)
-Able to work under pressure

Due to high demand, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted
Application must contain: Cover Letter + Updated Resume + Recent photo.
References are welcomed
Any incomplete application will not be taken into consideration.
All applications must be sent to the email below.
Company Profile: HGB Group is a private local Cambodian investment and holding company specializing in automotive, F&B, retail and luxury goods by bringing internationally renowned brands to the country.

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
•	Manages business data analysis tools that use business data and statistical methods to provide insight into business performance and suggest area and methods of improving operations.
•	Implements and oversees the analytical approaches and methodologies by collaboration together with cross functional managers / main users.
•	Oversea vendor management (SAP-BI, Margin Minder, Decision Point etc.)
•	Performed end user training regularly.
•	Leading the project to roll out enhancement and new business requirements
•	Continually ensure data quality via all methods of data entry
•	Ensure best practice is adhered to in terms of data input and management
•	Conduct regular data system audits to maintain quality
•	Manage Database activities including monitoring daily / operational service jobs, keeps management informed by preparing reports on system performance and problems.
Job Requirement:
Requirements:
•	Bachelor’s Degree in IT Application or related fields
•	3-5 years’ experience in IT related field, Preferred in Data/System Analysis qualification
•	Ability to solve both complex and uncomplicated problems by making decisions that are sensible given the available information
•	Strong English skills required to manage international vendors.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
A quality control technician working in a laboratory ensures that the lab procedures and equipment meet a certain standard. Quality control technicians test materials before, during, and after production to measure the characteristics of materials and ensure that they conform to specifications. Responsible for inspecting and testing the raw samples and results to make sure they meet required levels of quality. This position requires an associate's degree as the minimum educational requirement and a full-time position. This role is a gateway to a laboratory managerial post.

** Duties & Responsibilities
- Monitor the quality control and calibration of all laboratory tests
- Focal person in communication supplier maintenance
- Compile all laboratory reports to be submitted in admin
- Compile all send-out reports to be submitted to finance department
- Make the laboratory stock and order
- Make the laboratory staff roster
- Monitor the laboratory e-mail
- Performs other necessary tasks as assigned by management.
- Work closely with the laboratory manager in-charge
Job Requirement:
** Required Skills & Qualifications
- Confidence.
- Excellent technical skills.
- Good numerical skills and an understanding of laboratory data.
- Leadership skills.
- Planning and organization skills.
- Communication and interpersonal skills.
- Problem-solving skills.
- Team working skills
- Strong desire to grow professionally
- Minimum of 2 years laboratory technician experience.

** Interested candidates should send a CV with a cover letter to the Human Resources Department at the email
address below: The Handa Medical Center Romchek 4, Rattanak, Battambang (Along National Road 5) Office Telephone: 053-952 822

Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.

Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). Company Profile: CamboPura Glass, CPG, is a joint venture between Heng Sreng Hong Co., Ltd and Le-Guardian Pte., Ltd. The name is a combination of the word Cambodia and Singapura, exemplify the establishment of the glass factory in the Kingdom of Cambodia with the high standards and stringent quality of Singapore. Job Description:
The customer is the focus of everything we do, and millions of end users rely on our products daily. We believe in the value of empowering Specialist, Call Center Representative with the resources to solve critical problems for the future of our business, which is why we need you.

Specialist, Call Center Representative duties and responsibilities include: 
Customer Focus, Data Entry Skills, Building Relationships, People Skills, Problem Solving, Strong phone and verbal communication skills along with active listening, Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types, Ability to multi-task, set priorities and manage time effectively stress tolerance, high energy level.
  
What motivates you?  
• You obsess about customers, listen, engage and act for their benefit  
• You think big, with curiosity to discover ways to use your agile mindset and enable business outcomes  
• You thrive in teams, and enjoy getting things done together 
• You take ownership and build solutions, focusing on what matters  
• You do what is right, work with integrity and speak up 
• You share your humanity, helping us build a diverse and inclusive work environment for everyone 

On the job you will:
• Handle customer inquiries both by telephone, email and other means of communication
• Manage large amounts of inbound and outbound calls such as and not limited to Customer welcome calls, premium reminder call, and lapsed survey call
• Answers customer inquiries by providing valid and accurate information on a first call resolution
• Follow company’s call “scripts” when handling different types of calls 
• Identify customers’ needs and provide solutions and/or alternatives if cannot resolve during the first call, escalate unresolved problems immediately to management and follow up to ensure resolution is met 
• Build relationships and engage customers by taking the extra mile to provide pleasant customer experience 
• Maintains call center database 
• Provide customers with product and service information
• Enter new customer information into system
• Update existing customer information 
• Follow up customer calls where necessary
• Document all call information according to standard operating procedures
• Complete call logs
• Produce call reports such as monthly report, weekly report and daily report
• Update the complaints log 
• Other tasks assigned by management

Our commitment to you  
• Our mission; to be a part of making Decisions Easier and Lives Better 
• A leadership team dedicated to your growth and success  
• A bold ambition and set of goals to be a leader in driving transformation in our industry  
• Our best. Every day.  
• We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”.
Job Requirement:
We are looking for someone with:  
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  
• Excellent analytical, problem solving and solutioning skills  
• A capacity for constant learning from both success and failure  
• Open to change and continuous improvement  
  
Nice to Haves:   
• Bachelor degree in Business, Finance or related field is preferred
• Requires relevant work experience of 2 Years
• Computer literate in MS Word, Excel and PowerPoint
• Team Work, focused, results driven, professional maturity, and self-confidence
• Work efficiently and accurately and able to work under pressure and independently, a team player who is self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision
• Have a strong character and able to consider and advice on the consequences of various courses of action
• Detail oriented with patience on detail paper works and record setup in system
• High comfort level working in a diverse environment 

Learn more about opportunities with us at jobs.manulife.com. Join us now!

Interested applicants meeting the above requirements should submit their CVs, covering letters and National ID card by going to this link: http://www.manulife.com.kh/Corporate-Careers-Career-Possibilities and follow each of its step. 
For more details please contact Mr. Dy David via David_Dy@manulife.com. Or Ms. Choury Chim via Choury_Chim@manulife.com. Application should be submitted before 5th February 2021.  Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Company Profile: Manulife is a leading Canada-based financial services group with principal operations in Asia, Canada and the United States. Clients look to Manulife for strong, reliable, trustworthy and forward-thinking solutions for their most significant financial decisions. Our international network of employees, agents and distribution partners offers financial protection and wealth management products and services to millions of clients. We also provide asset management services to institutional customers. At the end of June 2016, we had US$718 billion in assets under management and administration, and in the previous 12 months we made more than US25.4 billion in benefits, interest and other payments to our customers. Our group of companies operates as Manulife in Canada and Asia and primarily as John Hancock in the United States. Manulife Financial Corporation trades as 'MFC' on the TSX, NYSE and PSE, and under '945' on the SEHK. We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”.

Job Description:
***អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលទទួលបានពីក្រុមហ៊ុនមានដូចជា៖

២-អាហារូបករណ៍គ្រួសារ ១០០% សម្រាប់ការសិក្សារបស់បុត្រធីតា/ក្មួយបង្កើត/ចៅបង្កើត រហូតដល់ ៤ នាក់

បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមរៀបចំប្រវត្តិរូប (CV) រួចយកមកដាក់នៅក្រុមហ៊ុនវេសឡាញ អាគារលេខ០៩Aផ្លូវ ៣៧០

Job Description:
The customer is the focus of everything we do, and millions of end users rely on our products daily. We believe in the value of empowering Specialist, Compliance with the resources to solve critical problems for the future of our business, which is why we need you.

The Legal and Compliance Specialist will be responsible for legal review and advice and identification, management and resolution of compliance-related issues in referring to legal and regulatory requirements, and company policies at corporate, regional and local levels. He/ she reports to Legal and Compliance Manager.
  
What motivates you?  
• You obsess about customers, listen, engage and act for their benefit  
• You think big, with curiosity to discover ways to use your agile mindset and enable business outcomes  
• You thrive in teams, and enjoy getting things done together 
• You take ownership and build solutions, focusing on what matters  
• You do what is right, work with integrity and speak up 
• You share your humanity, helping us build a diverse and inclusive work environment for everyone 

On the job you will:
• Review legal related documents e.g. contracts, agreements
• Carry out research and provide interpretation and advise relating to applicable regulatory changes and updates
• Review new business opportunities to ensure that compliance risks are identified and proper controls are established within the business
• Monitor the implementation of regulatory compliance related policies and procedures including AML, ATF, Anti-bribery & Corruption, Record Management, Privacy, etc.
• Monitor effective tracking system for compliance metrics and database
• Organize and conduct any in-house training if necessary
• Perform other duties assigned

We are looking for someone with:  
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  
• Excellent analytical, problem solving and solutioning skills  
• A capacity for constant learning from both success and failure  
• Open to change and continuous improvement

Our commitment to you  
• Our mission; to be a part of making Decisions Easier and Lives Better 
• A leadership team dedicated to your growth and success  
• A bold ambition and set of goals to be a leader in driving transformation in our industry  
• Our best. Every day.  
• We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”.
Job Requirement:
Nice to Haves:   
• Law degree holder from reputable universities;
• At least 2 years legal/compliance experience in insurance, financial industry or law firm
• PC literate in Ms. Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
• Willing to learn about new industry with strong sense of career development
• Ability to work effectively in a team and multi-cultural environment
• Analytical, attention to details, and creative problem solving abilities
• Ability to confront conflict and difficult issues in a professional, assertive and proactive manner
• Very good command of English language (writing and speaking)
• Display personal qualities of integrity, credibility and strong work ethic
• Willing to learn about new industry with strong sense of career development
• Ability to work effectively in a team and multi-cultural environment
• Analytical, attention to details, and creative problem solving abilities
• Ability to confront conflict and difficult issues in a professional, assertive and proactive manner
• Very good command of English language (writing and speaking)
• Display personal qualities of integrity, credibility and strong work ethic

job title: គ្រូកុំព្យូទ័រ(រើសបន្ទាន់)
position: គ្រូកុំព្យូទ័រ(រើសបន្ទាន់)
Job Description:
- បរិញ្ញាបត្ររងព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា (ជំនាញតបណ្តាញ និងគ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យ)
- បទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចមួយឆ្នាំទាក់ទងនឹងការងារក្នុងមុខតំណែងនេះ
- ចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសល្អ
- ជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង និងចាត់ចែងការងារល្អ
- មានចំណេះដឹង និងជំនាញថែទាំកុំព្យូទ័រ និងសម្ភារបរិក្ខា
- ចំណេះដឹងកុំព្យូទ័រ (MIS)
- មានភាពរួសរាយ​​ រាក់ទាក់ និងមានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
- មានស្មារតីធ្វើការងារក្រុម
- មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ និងម្ចាស់ការលើការងារ

Job Description:
•	Processing the agreements, which are obtained by the sales professionals, and also keeping a perfect data source of the client information regarding the payments details, communication details, product choices etc.
•	Keeping information of the site visits made, making sure that the goods have been sent to customers on schedule and keeping the updated information of the sales results.
•	Comparing the information later on to be able to determine whether they meet the sales targets and revenue objectives of the organization.
•	Preparing reviews for the products, if expected by the client and tracking the success of the continuous purchases.
•	Issue and submit quotation to sale team
•	Prepare and arrange machine delivery and installation for customers 
•	Provide sales with product catalogue and maintain the catalogue availability 
•	Record the minutes of meeting and send to the meeting attendance
•	Reporting monthly & weekly sales results to the sales team & manager
Job Requirement: •	Female applicant is preferred•	At least 1-2 years' experience in the Sales and Marketing industry •	Bachelor degree in business administration or other related fields•	Strong understanding of customer and market dynamics and requirements. •	Demonstrate ability to interact and cooperate with all company employees. •	Proactively establish and maintain effective working team relationships with all support departments.
Company Profile:
We import quality equipment & product all over the world to ensure you are only using the best. We also provide reliable after sales services to support you as you start your coffee business journey.

 Founded in 2009, KOFI is one of the largest company which distributes Espresso coffee, Espresso coffee machine, Syrup and other related coffee accessories in Cambodia. Our main priority is to focus on quality services, professionalism and integrity.

 We have expanded ourselves with 4 showrooms in difference provinces to better serve our customer all over Cambodia. With full coverage services in Phnom Penh, SiemReap, Sihanouk Vile and Battambang.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruiter  069 777 559 job@kofi.com.kh #66, Mao Tse Toung Blvd,Boeung Trabek, Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia  069 777 559

Job Description:
Job Description: 
-	To ensure applicant usability through process manual testing.
-	Execute regression test and sanity check for every release
-	Carry out IT function to ensure the smooth functioning and running of digital systems.
-	Provide on-going help desk support for digital banking including identifying and resolving user problem.

position: អ្នកវិភាគគុណភាព
Job Description:
តួនាទីការងារ
1.ត្រួតពិនិត្យអនាម័យបុគ្គលិក ទីកន្លែងការងារ និង ឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ មុនពេលចាប់ផ្តើម និង ក្រោយបញ្ចប់ការងារខ្សែចង្វាក់ផលិតកម្ម
2.ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពវត្ថុធាតុដើម ចាប់ពីទទួលបានពីចំការរហូតកែច្នៃទៅជាផលិតផលសំរេច
3.ធ្វើកំណត់ត្រាវិភាគគុណភាពរាល់ខ្សែចង្វាក់ផលិតកម្មដើម្បីធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងបន្ត
4.ធ្វើការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលបុគ្គលិកនូវគោលការណ៍អនាម័យនានា និង គ្រប់គ្រងឯកសារស៥ និង ឯកសារការអនុវត្តផលិតកម្មស្អាត GMP ដើម្បីរក្សាអោយបានសញ្ញាប័ត្ររៀងរាល់ការរំលឹកឡើងវិញ
5.ធ្វើការតាមដាននឹងវាយតម្លៃនូវខ្សែចង្វាក់ផលិតកម្ម រួចធ្វើរបាយការទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងបន្តដើម្បីបញ្ចៀសនូវហានិភ័យនានា
Job Requirement:
* តម្រូវការលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិដូចខាងក្រោម
-មានបទពិសោធន៍ ឬជានិស្សិតទើបបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាផ្នែកគីមី និង ចំណីអាហារ ឬផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ
-មានជំនាញស្រាវជ្រាវ និងប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ( Microsoft Word , Excel  & PowerPoint )
-អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសទាំងនិយាយ និង សរសេរ
-មានភាពក្លាហាន រឹងប៉ឹង ម៉ត់ចត់
-ចេះបែងចែកការងារអត្ថិភាព
-អាចធ្វើការរងសម្ពាធបាន

ទីតំាងធ្វើការ ៖ ភូមិទ្រា៣ សង្កាត់ស្ទឹងមានជ័យ ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ

Job Description:
តួនាទីការងារ
1.បែងចែកការងារក្នុងចំការ គ្រប់គ្រងកសិករក្នុងចំការ និង កត់ត្រារបាយការណ៍សកម្មភាពការងាររបស់កសិករ 
2.កត់ត្រារបាយការណ៍សីតុណ្ហភាព(ទឹកភ្លៀវ និងកំដៅ)
3.កត់ត្រារាល់ចំណាយ និងបែកចែកប្រភេទចំណាយផ្សេងៗក្នុងចំការ
4.ទិញសម្ភារៈ និងឧបករណ៍ដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងចំការ
5.ធ្វើផែនការការងារប្រចំាខែនិមួយៗ និង រាយការណ៍ទៅប្រធានផ្នែកបន្ត
6.ទូទាត់ភាគលាបតម្លៃកសិផលដែលប្រមូលផលបានពីចំការទំាងពីរជូនកសិករ
7.ចុះអនុវត្តន៍ការងារផ្ទាល់ជាមួយកសិករ និងផ្តល់បច្ចេកទេសក្នុងការធ្វើដូចជា ការលាយថ្នាំ ជី ការដំាដុះ រៀបចំដី និងការថែទំាដំណាំ របៀបនៃការរៀបចំប្រព័ន្ធទឹកធំ និងតូចអោយមានដំណើរការ
8.សិក្សា និង ព្យាយាមស្វែងរកបញ្ហាដែលកើតមានឡើងទៅលើដំណាំគោល និង រកវិធានការការពារ និង ដោះស្រាយ និង ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ទៅប្រធានផ្នែកបន្ត 
9.គណនាចំណាយលើសម្ភារៈដែលត្រូវប្រើដើម្បីកុំអោយនៅសល់ ឬ ខ្វះ
10.ជារៀងរាល់ខែត្រូវទៅទូទាត់វិក័យប័ត្រចំណាយផ្សេងៗជាមួយគណនេយ្យ និងទទួលប្រាក់ខែបុគ្គលិកចំការពី
រដ្ឋបាលឯភ្នំពេញទៅបើកជូនបុគ្គលិកចំការ
11.ធ្វើការប៉ាន់ប្រមាណពីការប្រមូលផលដើម្បីបំពេញតម្រូវការផ្នែកផលិតកម្ម មិនអោយមានការខ្វះខាត
12.ធ្វើកិច្ចពិភាក្សាជាមួយកសិករទៅលើតម្រូវការប្រើប្រាស់ និងរកដំណោះស្រាយរាល់ពេលមានបញ្ហាការងារ
Job Requirement:
-មានបទពិសោធន៍ ឬជានិស្សិតទើបបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាផ្នែកវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តកសិកម្ម
-មានការព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
-មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងចេះដឹកនំាក្រុមការងារ
-មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
-ផ្តល់អត្តិភាពចំពោះបេក្ខជនស្នាក់នៅខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ

Job Description:
1. Graphic Design
- Conceptualize new marketing materials
- Manage print related tasks
- Design/produce print related marketing materials
- Maintain brand consistency throughout your work
- Offer new ideas and concepts clearly and effectively to PR Director
- Coordinate all administrative aspects of production, including preparing final designs for presentation, checking and approving color, copy, text format separation and scaling images for print production. 
- Ensures that all parties are informed of and meet deadlines.
- May coordinate relationship with vendors; preparing specification and obtaining estimates for final approval
- May handle copyright, reprint, and permission processes

2. Information Technology (IT)
- Maintain company website and Facebook
- Install and configure computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers, scanners etc.,
- Determine users’ technical needs and provide them with appropriate solutions.
- Manage network configurations to ensure that all computers on a network can communicate effectively.
- Upgrade software, patches and operating systems on a continuous basis.
- Install and configure monitors, keyboards and printers.
- Solve troubleshoot hardware and software problems.
- Act as a technical resource in order to assist users with resolving computer issues.
- Ensure that all computers are secured effectively by installing and updating antivirus software.
- Keeping update IT inventory.
- Train users on new software.
- Perform other tasks as required.
Job Requirement:
- The post holder holds least Bachelor IT or equivalent.
- At least 2 experience the field related.
- Good English proficiency.
- Good communication skills.
- Demonstrable track record customer care/service skills.
- Methodical approach problem solving attention detail.
- Willingness develop accounting and knowledge.

Job Description:
- Coordinating with legal team, sales, accounting, construction team, managements, and relevant departments to ensure fast and accurate document processing 
- Ensuring that the company’s hotline phone number is responsive and taken care by sales admin
- Updating and explaining the information and terms in project factsheet, booking form, SPA, and IR
- Providing accurate project information toward internal teams and external agencies
- Maintaining client information and special approved terms to ensure high client’s satisfaction before and after house handover
- Ensuring the client’s requests will be fullfilled correctly before and after house handover
- Training, supporting and checking the internal team and agencies to use CRM system or client registration platform with accurate information
- Ensuring fairness and accuracy of client registration’s information, source of client, booking, SPA, and especially commission allocation to both internal teams and external agencies
- Reporting and coordinating any conflict or complaint or feedback from internal team, agencies and clients.
- Supporting Sales team to accurately fill in booking form and attach sufficient documents for SPA
- Coordinating and preparing booking form, and SPA for internal team’s purchase, and clients from top managements
- Preparing SPA and its attachments
- Using CRM to update the reports including house blocking summary, booking report, sales report, commission reports for internal team and agencies, sales team client’s registration, agency client’s registration, and client’s approved requests
- Directly reporting to Sales Admin Manager
- Handling other tasks assigned by Managements
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Business Administration, or other Business Degrees
- Proven work experience as a Sales administrator or Sales support agent (Minimum of 1 year)
- Hands on experience with CRM software and MS Office (MS Excel in particular)
- Excellent organizational and multitasking skills
- A team player with high level of dedication
- English literacy level needs to be average and above
- Understanding the sense of deadline
- Highly detail oriented and responsible

** Benefits:
+Basic salary 
+Lunch 
+Bonus
+18days of annual leave 
+And other benefit

** Working Hour: 
- 8hour per day (1hour lunch break), 6days per week (one day off per week)

Job Description:
** Key Responsibilities
• To work closely with the GM, CMG Staff, Field Manager (FM) and Data Manager  (DM) to plan and organise quality controls (QC)  on fieldwork of research projects to ensure the level of data quality is achieved and schedules are met. 
• To take part in pre-Fieldwork meetings / project briefing with relevant Field Staff so that questionnaire format, logic is understood and plan work schedules for each project.					
• To ensure the working schedules are adhered as agreed during pre-fieldwork meetings 					
• Fully in charge of QC process and documentation for every project 					
• Working time is 70% in field  ; 30% in the office					
• To coordinate with Field Staff in order to provide weekly report to CMG staff  about fieldwork and QC progress and level of accuracy when required.					
• To immediately inform CMG Staff  / Field Staff of any issues that might effect the timely completion of projects, and to identify possible solutions to those problems to ensure they are resolved.  					
• To inform  CMG Staff and Field Staff about interviewer performance at the end of each project so that interviewers performance can be updated accordingly.					
• To conduct meetings as required with CMG Staff and Field Staff to highlight errors so that data collection difficulties can be quickly resolved 					
• To maintain and keep QC records / files 					
• To be the main person in the recruitment of QC Staff and QC outsourced agencies					
• To be the main person in managing and monitoring performance of QC Staff and QC outsourced agencies					
Key Qualifications
• To accurately prepare and complete necessary administrative documents (annual leaves etc…) within specified timeframes to ensure compliance and efficient management of internal administrative procedures.					
• To maintain accurate project expense records to ensure compliance with IRL financial administrative procedures.					
• To contribute and develop ideas with the IRL team  so that Quality Control operations can run more efficiently.					
• To use “non busy” periods in the office as an opportunity to offer assistance to colleagues with their work so that IRL teamwork develops and improves

Company Profile:
VTrust Appraisal Co., Ltd. is a Phnom Penh based appraisal firm to providing timely and accurate valuation services with code of ethical conduct, for local and international clients including banks, private companies, individuals, underwriters, government agencies etc... Since 2004 until present, we are the local market leader and the only firm carrying out all the Pre-IPO valuation so far. Our firm provides pre-IPO, residential, commercial, industrial, agricultural property valuations in addition to business valuation and consultancy valuations. With our 15 years’ experience of valuation has allowed us to accumulate an extensive database of independent real estate transactions across Cambodia. As an industry advanced, we have provided the real market value with highest educational and valuation professional standards of RICS from UK and Global. Job Description:
--	To inspect buildings electrical and water related equipment and systems.
-	To identify maintenance issues, such as power cuts, leaky pipes and faulty electrical switches in the risers and all electrical & pump rooms and to report them and create work assignments for the MEP staff. Supervisor to ensure Proactive Preventive Maintenance schedule planning, write out essential equipment checklist for PPM.
-	To be on Stand-by and to respond whenever there are issues with electricity and water supply
-	To maintain inventory, such as tools and Spare parts related to Electricity & water systems and equipment like generators and water pumps.
-	To ensure safety of MEP team staff and facility is a primary responsibility of MEP Supervisor. 
-	Keep track of the functioning of safety equipment and security measures adapted in the facility linked with Electricity & water. 
-	Immediate reporting of any errors or faults in the systems to the BM and get it repaired as quickly as possible.
-	Manage term contractors/ specialist contractors to ensure smooth operation of building systems related to Electricity & water.
-	Provide client/ authorities/ tenants with updates of electrical, water and other service outages and scheduled shutdowns

-	Assist to Attend to feedback by tenants/ clients, to recommend and take remedial actions with regards to electrical & water related technical issues
-	Any other assigned by the Building Manager & Senior Management related to MEP matters.
Job Requirement:
- At least with a Bachelor’s degree in Real Estate/ Facility Management and or equivalent. (Facilities management or Building maintenance or Electrical or Mechanical Engineering)
- At least 1 to 2 years of experience in facilities management or relevant technical job
- Must have good communication skills, friendly and able to discuss technical matters boldly.
- Must be brave to highlight points & related issues to owners/ tenants/ contractors & client
- Ability to communicate in English or Chinese

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Comin Asia  095 777 480/095 666901/0963228856 ck.hr@comin.com.kh #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 095 777 480/095 666901/0963228856

-Educate employees and line managers about on relevant processes and systems.
-Manage employee onboarding, offboarding as well as other HR related processes and work with relevant stakeholders to ensure positive experiences of the employees.
-Identify ways to improve HR processes to create employee experiences.
-Manage employee’s queries and case management following the agreed service level agreement (SLA)
-Ensure employees data accuracy through conducting regular sample checks.
-Ensure labor and operational compliances are fulfilled including staff in out declaration, work permit arrangement and other operational & compliance requirements.
-Ensure HR processes and standards are in place following the AIA’s standard practices.
-Administer payroll and relevant employee’s compensation administration process end to end (starting from data collection, calculation to payment) 
-Work with relevant stakeholder to ensure payment is done on time with no errors.
-Work with relevant team to provide monthly accrual to Finance department
-Perform tax filing and work with Tax preparer to ensure tax preparation is completed on time.
-Provide reports and analysis to AIA Group, Regulators and as requested by managements. 
-Ensure risk and compliances are fulfilled with no errors.
-Ensure efficiency and effectiveness of the work by having frequent review on the processes and practices through collective feedback from employees and stakeholders.
-Performs other responsibilities and duties periodically assigned by supervisor in order to meet operational and / or other requirements
Job Requirement:
•Qualification & requirement:
-University Degree in Human Resources Management or equivalent. 
-At least 2-3 years working experiences in HR Operations, Payroll and related fields
-Proactive and a problem solver in a fast-moving industry
-Detail minded, efficient, responsible, self-motivated and able to work under pressure 
-A good team player who is keen to learn 
-Highly driven and results-focused in a fast-paced environment 
-Proficient command of spoken and written English
-Good inter-personal skill

•Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Friday: 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm
Company Profile: AIA Cambodia is guided by our Purpose to help Cambodians live Healthier, Longer, Better lives. Since commencing business in 2017, we’ve become the first life insurer to provide coverage on 26 critical illnesses. As among the Kingdom’s leading insurers, AIA Cambodia today offers market-leading life solutions for all walks of life ranging from tailor-made crucial coverage plans that include critical illnesses, accidents, hospital allowances and overseas emergency assistance.AIA Cambodia has strived to make a significant, positive impact for our customers and communities. As we look to the future, this commitment is reinforced by our Purpose: to help millions of people live Healthier, Longer, Better Lives. Our Purpose guides the decisions we make and the actions we take as an organization — empowering and enabling people to understand and manage their health, while meeting their long-term savings and protection needs. Helping create a healthier Asia is one of the most important and valuable things we can do for our communities, today and tomorrow.AIA Cambodia is the only Cambodian life insurer awarded HR Asia’s “Best Companies to Work for in Asia” for three consecutive years, in 2020, 2021 and 2022. Headquartered in Phnom Penh, the company currently has branches in Siem Reap, Kampot, Kampong Cham and Battambang.

Job Description:
- Support superior in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources
- Support the implementation of accounts payable processes and internal controls to ensure governance over the Accounts Payable function
- Record all accounts payable and payment transactions to ensure timely and accurate monthly and yearly accounts payable closing. Prepare creditors aging and reconcile payments against invoices/bank records/aging
- Gather and compile information needed for the preparation of the monthly accounts payable and payment status reports
- Maintain database containing vendors' details (payment terms, bank account details, etc.) for payment processing reference. Update payment terms and other agreements with external vendors
- Support continuous improvement initiatives that streamline existing accounts payable processes and improve efficiencies through a better utilization of automated systems 
- Respond to basic queries and information requests from internal stakeholders on creditors' outstanding balances, payment status, payment terms, etc.
Job Requirement:
- No experience is required.
- Fresh graduate is welcomed. 
- Diploma or basic certification in Accounting/Finance or a related discipline (preferred)
- Demonstrate a basic knowledge in managing accounts payable and application of local/international accounting standards, principles and practices
- Proven hands-on experience in SAP accounting applications is an advantage
- Demonstrate strong attention to detail and basic analytical skills
- Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)
- Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Job Description: To support the Smart Head of Internal Audit and provide objective independent assurance on the design and operations of the system of internal controls within Smart.The role will be to bring a systematic and disciplined approach to evaluate and improve the effectiveness in risk management, internal controls, and governance processes, with emphasis on IT controls.- Conduct financial, business, operational, strategic, and compliance audits under minimal direction/supervision.- Ensure successful completion of audits, from start to finish, inclusive of planning, fieldwork, and reporting activities.- Assist in developing annual audit plan and audit program.- Document audit work in an organized, accurate, and concise manner, clearly supporting the identified findings and conclusions reached in the audits performed.- Prepare audit report including making recommendations that mitigate risk/control deficiencies and add value.- Follow up with the auditee to ensure that audit recommendations have been effectively implemented.Identify opportunities to: + Enhance current audit methodologies and recommend improvements to the audit process/activities. + Improve, streamline, reinvent audit activities through data analytics or automation. + implement continuous monitoring and auditing procedures.- Assist in special ad-hoc reviews, fraud investigations, and other special projects.- Able to express audit results as quantifiable outcomes, in financial terms where possible.- Able to not just test for compliance, but also strategic risks to the company.
Job Requirement: - Bachelors' degree with major in Computer Science, MIS, or equivalent education. Big 4 experience is a strong merit.- A minimum of at least 2 years of audit experience is required.- Knowledge of the International Professional Practices Framework (IPPF), COSO Framework, data analytics (in an audit environment), and audit management software will be an added advantage.- Excellent delivery and project management skills, e.g. managing own time, prioritizing audits appropriately, and ensuring deadlines and objectives are met. Promptly communicates ahead of time any potential problems that would prevent timely completion of the audit.- Possess good judgment, strong ethical values/integrity and is able to maintain independence and standards of professionalism.- Highly inquisitive, has a keen eye for details, a good listener, and the maturity to appreciate the sensitivity of each audit.- Excellent verbal and written communication skills, and confident in engaging with all levels of company management including the Board Audit Committee.- Ability to initiate, build, and maintain effective relationships with the auditee and across Axiata Group to achieve results. Comfortable working in a team environment and independently.- Champions change continuous improvement and innovation and support others in the pursuit of these.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូគណិតវិទ្យា
Job Description:
** Overall Purpose of the Role / គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី : 
លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូត្រូវបង្រៀនសិស្សានុសិស្សឱ្យទទួលបាននូវ ចំណេះសម្បទា បំណិនសម្បទា និងចរិយាសម្បទា ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ ស្របតាមនិយាមគរុកោសល្យ១០០%។

** Scope of Work / ទំហំការងារ :
ក្រៅពីការងារបង្រៀន និងរៀន លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូត្រូវមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការអប់រំសិស្សានុសិស្សនូវចតុស្តម្ភនៃការអប់រំ ដូចជារៀនដើម្បីមានចំណេះដឹង រៀនដើម្បីមានចំណេះធ្វើ រៀនដើម្បីមានសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ និង រៀនដើម្បីចេះរួមរស់ជាមួយអ្នកដទៃ។
Job Requirement: EDUCATION / ការសិក្សា :• មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ។• សញ្ញាបត្រដែលទទួលបានចុងក្រោយ : ** KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធ:• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Office, Internet/ E-mail ។ល។• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស...)។• មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតួចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។• មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។• មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំយ៉ាងតិច។** KEY RESPONSIBILITIES / ការទទួលខុសត្រូវសំខាន់ៗ១. ការងារគរុកោសល្យ។២. ការអប់រំសីលធម៌។៣. ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។៤. ការចូលរួម។៥. ទំនាក់ទំនង។*** Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted within 7 working daysPlease submit your cover letter, CV and 4 x 6 current photo to email HR department of MJQeducation as below.*** How to apply:1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.2. company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• រៀបចំបង្កើតក្រុមការងារMJQTV ដោយរួមមានការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ទិញឧបករណ៍ និងសម្ភារៈបច្ចេកទេសផ្សេងៗដែលជាតម្រូវការក្នុងការងារផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍
• រៀបចំផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍និងចងក្រងគោលការណ៍កន្លែងការងារ ដើម្បីឱ្យMJQTVអាចដំណើរការបានដោយរលូននិងមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់ 
• បែងចែកក្រុមការងារដើម្បីថតផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍រួមមាន បទយកការណ៍ ព័ត៌មាន កិច្ចសម្ភាសន៍ ដើម្បីផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីសកម្មភាពនិងទស្សនៈផ្សេងៗរបស់ស្ថាបនិក ប្រធានក្រុមប្រឹក្សាភិបាល និងអគ្កនាយកប្រតិបត្តិ ព្រមទាំងសកម្មភាពរបស់មូលនិធិ ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច
• ដឹកនាំការផលិតវីដេអូពាណិជ្ជកម្មអំពីសេវាកម្មរបស់ សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលភាសាAii
• គ្រប់គ្រង សម្របសម្រួលការងារ ផ្នែកលិខិតរដ្ឋបាលមួយចំនួន នៃផ្នែក MJQTV
• ក្លាយជាពិធីកររបស់កម្មវិធីកិច្ចសន្ទនាជាមួយលោកឧកញ៉ា វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិត គួច ម៉េងលី ផលិតព័ត៌មាន 
• ចូលរួមប្រជុំ ជាមួយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ តាមផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ 
• ចែករំលែកចំណេះដឹងដល់ក្រុមការងារនិងសហការីផ្សេងទៀតក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន ក្នុងគោលបំណងដើម្បីបង្កើនធនធានជំនាញថត ភាពច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការងារផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍នៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន។
• សហការណ៍ជាមួយនាយកដ្ឋានព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា ដើម្បីបង្កើតគេហទំព័រ ព្រមទាំងបណ្តាញសង្គមហ្វេសប៊ុក យូធូប។ល។   
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងបណ្តាញសង្គមរបស់MJQTV រួមមានការផូសវីដេអូ រូបភាព ចែករំលែក ឆ្លើយតប ប្រកបដោយក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ ដើម្បីបង្កើនប្រជាប្រិយភាពនិងទទួលបានការគាំទ្រពីសំណាក់មហាជន 
• ត្រួវពិនិត្យនិងធ្វើសេចក្តីសម្រេចចិត្តនូវរាល់ខ្លឹមសារនៃកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍ទាំងអស់មុននឹងចេញផ្សាយ
• ពិនិត្យការទំនាក់ទំនងខាងក្នុង ដើម្បីសម្របសម្រួលការងារដល់បុគ្គលិក ( បំពេញបែបបទ និងស្នើឯកសារ ណាមួយដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ)
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការស្នើរសុំរបស់ថ្នាក់នាំក្រុមហ៊ុន។
Job Requirement: • បានបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើងទៅ លើជំនាញគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយ សារព័ត៌មាននិងទំនាក់ទំនង ព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា។ KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍:• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី២ឆ្នាំឡើង ក្នុងវិស័យសារព័ត៌មានទូរទស្សន៍ វិទ្យុ ផលិតកម្មភាពយន្ត។ល។ • មានសមត្ថភាពអាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី កាត់តវីដេអូ Adobe Premier, Adobe Audio Audition, និងPhotoshop។ • មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិតខ្ពស់• មានចំណេះទូលំទូលាយលើបញ្ហាទូទៅទាំងក្នុងប្រទេសនិងពិភពលោក • មានភាពបត់បែននិងអត់ធ្មត់ខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ*** How to apply:1. Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: Key Account Executive (Corporate Sales)- Siem Reap
position: Key Account Executive (Corporate Sales)- Siem Reap
Job Description:
- Identify potential customers and approach them to increase sale of postpaid sim cards, PBX systems, M2M sim cards.
- Build a professional relationship and network with new and existing customers to increase customer loyalty to Smart.
- Be a central contact point and closely work with support team to solve customers’ requirements and needs.
- Prepare weekly sale result and sale forecast including prospect customers for closing.
- Perform other tasks as assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in sales & marketing or any equivalence
- Pursuing 1 to 2-year experience in sales
- Being good at negotiation, problem-solving, and presentation skill
- Being good at writing and speaking English
- Being able to prioritize the tasks and work under pressure
- Based in Siem Reap

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
- រៀបចំបង្កើតក្រុមការងារMJQTV ដោយរួមមានការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ទិញឧបករណ៍ និងសម្ភារៈបច្ចេកទេសផ្សេងៗដែលជាតម្រូវការក្នុងការងារផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍
- រៀបចំផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍និងចងក្រងគោលការណ៍កន្លែងការងារ ដើម្បីឱ្យMJQTVអាចដំណើរការបានដោយរលូននិងមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់ 
- បែងចែកក្រុមការងារដើម្បីថតផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍រួមមាន បទយកការណ៍ ព័ត៌មាន កិច្ចសម្ភាសន៍ ដើម្បីផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីសកម្មភាពនិងទស្សនៈផ្សេងៗរបស់ស្ថាបនិក ប្រធានក្រុមប្រឹក្សាភិបាល និងអគ្កនាយកប្រតិបត្តិ ព្រមទាំងសកម្មភាពរបស់មូលនិធិ ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច
- ដឹកនាំការផលិតវីដេអូពាណិជ្ជកម្មអំពីសេវាកម្មរបស់ សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលភាសាAii
- គ្រប់គ្រង សម្របសម្រួលការងារ ផ្នែកលិខិតរដ្ឋបាលមួយចំនួន នៃផ្នែក MJQTV
- ក្លាយជាពិធីកររបស់កម្មវិធីកិច្ចសន្ទនាជាមួយលោកឧកញ៉ា វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិត គួច ម៉េងលី ផលិតព័ត៌មាន 
- ចូលរួមប្រជុំ ជាមួយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ តាមផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ 
- ចែករំលែកចំណេះដឹងដល់ក្រុមការងារនិងសហការីផ្សេងទៀតក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន ក្នុងគោលបំណងដើម្បីបង្កើនធនធានជំនាញថត ភាពច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការងារផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍នៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- សហការណ៍ជាមួយនាយកដ្ឋានព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា ដើម្បីបង្កើតគេហទំព័រ ព្រមទាំងបណ្តាញសង្គមហ្វេសប៊ុក យូធូប។ល។   
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងបណ្តាញសង្គមរបស់MJQTV រួមមានការផូសវីដេអូ រូបភាព ចែករំលែក ឆ្លើយតប ប្រកបដោយក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ ដើម្បីបង្កើនប្រជាប្រិយភាពនិងទទួលបានការគាំទ្រពីសំណាក់មហាជន 
- ត្រួវពិនិត្យនិងធ្វើសេចក្តីសម្រេចចិត្តនូវរាល់ខ្លឹមសារនៃកម្មវិធីទូរទស្សន៍ទាំងអស់មុននឹងចេញផ្សាយ
- ពិនិត្យការទំនាក់ទំនងខាងក្នុង ដើម្បីសម្របសម្រួលការងារដល់បុគ្គលិក ( បំពេញបែបបទ និងស្នើឯកសារ ណាមួយដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ)
- បំពេញការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការស្នើរសុំរបស់ថ្នាក់នាំក្រុមហ៊ុន។
Job Requirement:
- បានបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើងទៅ លើជំនាញគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយ សារព័ត៌មាននិងទំនាក់ទំនង ព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា។

- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី២ឆ្នាំឡើង ក្នុងវិស័យសារព័ត៌មានទូរទស្សន៍ វិទ្យុ ផលិតកម្មភាពយន្ត។ល។ 
- មានសមត្ថភាពអាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី កាត់តវីដេអូ Adobe Premier, Adobe Audio Audition, និងPhotoshop។ 
- មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិតខ្ពស់

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

Job Description:

Company Profile: Southbridge International School Cambodia (SISC) is a leading international school in Cambodia which located in the Borey Peng Houth Boeugn Snor, Housing Development in the south of the vibrant city of Phnom Penh. The school currently caters for Nursery, Kindergarten, Primary and Secondary students ranging from Pre-school (2 ½ years old) to Grade 11 (17 years old) as it grows leading to its first graduating class in June 2022.

Job Description:
-Tracking purchase flow and services on time 
-Ensure that all purchases comply with school policy.
-Ensure that purchasing selection meets both competitive price or cost efficiency and high quality of goods and services.   
-Evaluate and compare the supplier quotes of products and services to be purchased
-Monitor delivery of goods and services matching with invoices
-Search of price for goods and services. 
-Ensure that purchasing processes are transparent.
-Maintaining and updating supplier information. 
-Maintain good supplier relations
-Supervise and train a Procurement Assistant 
-Other tasks as assigned by Finance Manager 
-Vendor Management 
-Cost Saving Report
-Tracking the goods quality
-Proactive and Negotiation Skill
-Get invoice with credit term 
-Follow the procedure of company compliance rule
Job Requirement:
•Bachelor's degree (business degree is preferable)
•At least 2 year experience related to this role.
•Computer literacy (Word, Excel, e-mail, Internet).
•Strong organization and interpersonal communication skill
•Initiative, Creative, hard-working, friendly, team work, and strong commitment.
•Must be able to speak and written in English

position: គ្រូភ្លេង​ (បឋមនិងមធ្យម)
Job Description: ** Overall Purpose of the Role / គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី: • ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា• ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់• អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%• ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍...• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%** Scope of Work / ទំហំការងារ: បង្រៀនមុខវិជ្ជាភ្លេង• ពិនិត្យអវត្តមាន និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា• ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់• សរសេររកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងផែនការបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• មើលសិស្សពេលចេញលេង និងពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ•  រៀបចំកិច្ចការផ្ទះ វិញ្ញាសាប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស   និងកែឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ• ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិសាលា • សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវរកវិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនល្អៗ និងថ្មីៗ• អប់រំសិស្សអោយក្លាយជាកូនល្អ សិស្សល្អ មិត្តល្អ ពលរដ្ឋល្អ• ត្រូវបង្កើតបទបញ្ញត្តិថ្នាក់រៀននីមួយៗ• ផ្តល់ចំណេះដឹងពិតប្រាកដមួយដល់សិស្ស• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%• បង្រៀនសិស្សតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលសាលាដាក់ជូន• បង្រៀនអោយទាន់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាសាលាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព• ប្រគល់កិច្ចការឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលសាលាបានកំណត់ជូន• សហការគ្នាឱ្យបានល្អរវាងក្រុមការងារ• ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍...• អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%• ដឹងច្បាស់នូវរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធសាលា• ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន• បំផុសទឹកចិត្តសិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីរបស់សាលាឱ្យបានផុសផុល• ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ដល់ចាងហ្វាង ឬក្រុមការងារពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា• គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនឱ្យបាន១០០%៕
Job Requirement: EDUCATION / ការសិក្សា:• មានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈ• ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ Computer (Word Excel Power Point and email…)** KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍:• ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាដ៏ល្អជាមួយសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល• គោរពម៉ោងការងារ• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ• ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយកុមារ• ស្រឡាញ់កុមារ និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន• មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ • មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនច្រើនឆ្នាំ*** How to apply:1. Job Description:
Support superior in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources

-Support the implementation of accounts payable processes and internal controls to ensure governance over the Accounts Payable function

-Record all accounts payable and payment transactions to ensure timely and accurate monthly and yearly accounts payable closing. Prepare creditors aging and reconcile payments against invoices/bank records/aging

-Gather and compile information needed for the preparation of the monthly accounts payable and payment status reports

-Maintain database containing vendors' details (payment terms, bank account details, etc.) for payment processing reference. Update payment terms and other agreements with external vendors.

-Respond to basic queries and information requests from internal stakeholders on creditors' outstanding balances, payment status, payment terms, etc.
Job Requirement:
-Demonstrate basic knowledge and understanding of the business and industry.

-Demonstrate a basic knowledge in managing accounts payable and application of local/international accounting standards, principles and practices.

-Demonstrate strong attention to detail and basic analytical skills.

-Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint).

- Flexible and hardworking
- Patient and reliable
- Diploma or basic certification in Accounting/Finance or a related discipline (preferred).
- Fresh graduate and one year experience in related field is plus
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Noev Sophea  087880661 jobs.kh@dksh.com No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 087880661

Job Description:

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Join DKSH.DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
