Job Description:
** Marketing and Advertising
- Collaborate with Urbanland HQ to create and execute yearly, quarterly, monthly and/or weekly marketing and promotion campaign plans, understanding K Mall positioning and ensuring consistency in brand visuals and messaging across all channels
- Manage online and offline mall advertising eg common area advertising, website, social media campaigns, etc in both Khmer and English, maximizing revenue where possible
- Manage kmall.com.kh website, social media, email comms public relations, working with UBL HQ to establish marketing strategy and calendar
- Work with Urbanland HQ and/or agencies to design and produce collaterals eg hoarding, brand guide, fit-out guide, social posts, brochure, photography, videos, website etc
- Organize meetings with external parties such as potential sponsors, website consultants, retailers and the marketing internal team
- Propose and implement ways to maximise revenue through mall advertising
- Market research of other malls in country or region, flagging any new developments or trends
- Maintain exceptional visual presentation, design standards and tenants use for the retail zones of the property
- Oversee and ensure information is up to date on mall directories, signages and posters etc
- Implement, manage and maintain efficient marketing workflow systems to ensure timely delivery especially following the plans, schedules and deliverables.
- Work with Urbanland HQ to create press releases and establish annual press release distribution plan and manage schedule, maintain positive relationships with press and keep press contacts current, working with PR agencies where necessary
- Respond to media enquiries and escort approved media on property

** Tenant liaison
- Work closely with Leasing team to establish and maintain effective communication and good relationship with tenants, external organizers or suppliers, including hosting monthly marketing meetings with tenants, communicating via monthly reports, meetings and emails and more
- Monitor tenants daily, analyze tenant sales results and support tenants to increase their sales by coordinating promotional activities and promoting their offers across K Mall on-site and online channels
- Engage and coordinate with retailers and co-sponsors for PR or marketing purposes, liaise on events/promotional/advertising plans to involve them with mall marketing activities

** Event organization
- Manage events program and event spaces for tenant hire and source clients for external hire
- Conceive, plan and implement all event initiatives to encourage footfall and ensure buy-in from tenants for mall sponsored community events, merchandising events, third party/partner events and retailed-based events
- Prepare promotional materials, collaterals as well as event notifications outlining responsibilities to ensure event needs are communicated to relevant departments and tenants involved
- Document each event and create event recaps that include photos, ROI, retailer/partner results, press clippings as well as an event summary.
Reporting and Budgeting
- Set annual, quarterly and/or monthly marketing goals for relevant platforms
- Maintain regular reporting and record keeping such as gathering, interpreting and presenting data from marketing, sales and leasing activity, contribute to monthly corporate and merchant reports, collating and calculating value of mall press clippings and more
- Budget management of events and campaigns in line with overall budget
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in marketing or related field, or relevant industry qualification
- At least 3 years’ experience in event management
- Experience in supervising team is a bonus
- Experience in the retail industry is a bonus
- Experience with creating a marketing campaign, marketing strategy, and marketing plan
- Experience with digital marketing eg social media, content marketing, influencer relations
- Experience with ATL advertising eg outdoor, radio and TV advertising
- Understanding of public relations
- Can demonstrate sense of curiosity, open-mindedness, customer-centeredness, and a consistent desire to learn and to adapt to an ever-evolving market
- Well-rounded oral and written communication skills in English and Khmer
- Good communicator, excellent interpersonal skills and negotiation skills
- Excellent presentation skills including planning and creation
- Able to work well under pressure
- Be a team leader, able to inspire others
- Proactive and able to work well independently and collaborate as a team to tight deadlines
- Professional, positive attitude with a strong work ethic and willingness to learn
- Proficient skills in Microsoft Office eg Outlook, Excel, Word and PowerPoint
- Energetic, enthusiastic and passionate about their work and creating positive change
- Understanding of brands and the marketing mix
- Good analytical skills, able to respond and adapt to market and tenant data
- Knowledge of digital analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, etc)

Job Description:
•Performs audit work in Client’s office for audit areas assigned to him/her; follows audit techniques suggested by assistant managers/senior associate and considers work paper documentation required by assistant managers/senior associate in documenting the audit work done.
•Reports to assistant managers/senior associate any audit/accounting issues noted for a Client and discusses/proposes alternative solutions to the issue noted.
•Ensures that all overtime work is pre-approved by assistant managers/senior associate by completing an overtime form sheet
•Resolves all review notes of audit partner/manager/assistant manager/senior associate
•Documents all audit procedures performed before signing off on the audit programme
•Ensures that the audit work is completed with the quality consistent with GT standards within time budget prepared by supervisor/senior
•Provides miscellaneous assistance to higher-level personnel in the preparation of Proposals or in various other projects
•Provides explanations and on-the-job training to assistants with less experience
•Performs clerical duties related to Engagements such as requisitioning supplies needed by Engagement team for fieldwork and organizing paper work files prior to review by higher-level personnel or before filing
•Conducts himself/herself professionally and liaises with Client’s middle management for smooth flow of audit work
•Maintains a good working relationship with the Client
Job Requirement:
Required Qualifications:

1.Education: University degree preferably in Auditing/ Accounting or business related fields
2.Special license/certificate: Either holds a current and valid ACCA/CPA's certificate, or be working toward obtaining the certificates by taking and passing the applicable state ACCA/CPA exams
3.Fresh graduate or minimum 1 year of recent external audit service, and dealing in team work
4.Good working knowledge of Word, Excel and PowerPoint and Internet searching skill
5.Good comment in English

Job Description:
• Manages, oversees coordination and guide activities of the function covering: contract procurement, tender documentation, tender evaluation, value engineering and cost awareness and management, post contract management.
• Take lead to advise management on strategies for dispute resolution in the event of a commercial dispute, arbitration and/or litigation (if any), for all projects.
• Advise on best strategies, or where necessary step in, to negotiate with external parties on pricing, contractual terms, variation / change orders, commercial agreements, and final accounts settlements etc. with both internal and external stakeholders, partners, contractors, suppliers, consultants, service providers and vendors, and reinforcing the profile, professional image and good reputation of the company in the industry.
• Key person to Present feasibility studies and regularly keeps track of updated cost estimates and cost planning
• Provide clear analysis of situation and evaluation of cost and commercial data arising from different areas and factors of development and provide appropriate cost management solutions.
• Set up and evolve SOPs for forecasting, reporting, reviews, evaluations and updates for cash-flow, tenders, progress claims / payment, variations, budget and cost control, change order management, company and department timelines and milestones etc.
• Ensure that quantity survey & cost processes are adhered to across the projects/ business units and actively
• Understand the processes and procedures used by any projects under Urbanland Group that we are working within and assist in their development and improvement
• Collate actual costs in accordance with the respective work breakdown structure and capture all cost base requirements
• Ensure final accounts are prepared timely and accurately
• Ensure financial information for audits is collated and cost assurance processes are followed

Reporting:

• Ensure robust, accurate and timely cost and value reporting at both project and business unit level
• Set up and maintain a QS cost database of current rates and pricing. The database shall be updated frequently for budgeting and management of project cost.
• Ensure accurate cash flow reporting takes place
• Carry out cost management including forecasting
• Provide reports on actual costs v estimate and identify underlying reasons for any variance

External Relationships:
• Ensure that any main contracts entered into have terms and conditions that are appropriate for the company, with commercial risks identified
• Ensure the contract is properly administered including timely issue of early warnings and contractual notices, ensuring that the relevant parties are kept informed
• Ensure that the supply chain are engaged appropriately with the correct contract terms and conditions
• Build and maintain good relationships with clients, suppliers as well as main contractors
• Be responsible for subcontract letting, negotiation and financial accounting
• Liaise with the client, client representatives, main contractors, suppliers and other third parties on commercial issues, including agreement of variations, claims and additional payments
Internal Relationships:
• Accountable for the department’s overall performance.
• Plan and Drive department members’ career goals and performance standards through training and development courses, expert communication and effective use of the performance management processes within the QS department.
• Act as Mentor/Advisor to subordinates to resolve technical, commercial, and human relations matters.
• Manages the resources on project and within the team to drive maximum efficiencies.
• Work with project management to forecast predicted spend and cash recovery and ensure that both are kept in line with target
• Work closely with the procurement team to develop and monitor procurement strategy
• Ensure all project management team members understand the contractual arrangements
• Work with the project management & procurement Team to ensure project and programme risk mitigation plans are considered, put in place and administered
• Be proactive and advise site teams on costs and management of costs
Job Requirement:
• Degree in Construction Management, Building Science, Real Estate Management, Civil Engineering or Architecture
• Diploma in Quantity Surveying would be an advantage
• Worked at least 6 years in the real estate industry in the field of Quantity Surveying in various developments.
• At least 3 years in managing team
• Ethics and Integrity 3 - Must operate ethically and with integrity, while prioritizing safety and security in all that you do, safeguarding the company's interests.
• Leadership Skill 3 – as per leadership behavior ie: guide, train, advice and protect department members in social and career path,
• Project management skill 2
• Decision making skill 3 - Know how to prioritize, advocate focus and accountability
• Judgmental skill 2 - Possess common sense and good judgement
• Be team-work focused 3 - Be collaborative, innovative and strategic.
• Delegation skill 3 - Able to delegate work and protect department members even under tremendous pressure
• Problem solving skill 3
• Professional and good social behavior 2
• English language 3
• Mandarin would be an advantage 2

Job Description:
Job Description
 	Seeds Garment (Cambodia) Co., Ltd is the international garment factory based in Hong Kong. 
It is company policy to provide equal opportunity for all applicants on experience.
Now we are seeking for the qualified candidates for Senior Production Coordinator
Basic salary :  Negotiable
Working time : 07:00am−16:00pm
Working date : Monday – Saturday

Job Responsibility
** Education working experience:
1. Coordinate with QC team and all sections for the standard inspection procedure on every style; make sure the instant corrective action plan for GMT after “Q” reject is in place.
2. Update Sewing plan to all 32 Sewing line.
3. Update all material status into production planning
4. Follow up shipment schedule 
5. Headcount sewing line report 
6. Production Material request 
7. Advise the final rejected qty from Lines to QA/QC
8. Corrective Action Plan 
9. Broken Needle Report. 
10. Check the line before they start working what are the problems that cannot meet the target. 
11. Inform lines to arrange garment in line for QC inspection 
12. Perform any other duties as assigned by the management from time to time
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements
1. University graduate or above
2. Minimum 3-4 years relevant experience, previous exposure in garment manufacturing would be an advantage
3. Self-motivate/initiative, perseverant, fair and trustworthy.
4. A team player and able to coordinate, liaise and work with different departments; 
5. Good command in both spoken and written English, Chinese is an advantage
6.Have a good knowledge experience in using MS Office 
7. Good typing and able to type in Khmer Unicode
8. Be able to work independently and under pressure

In response to our rapid growth, we are looking for smart and self-motivated candidate to join us with many positions as listed below:

1.	Sales Representative:  8 Positions 

Duties:

-	Develop, build, and manage a client base of corporate accounts.
-	Oversee the sales process at each stage from quote to purchasing to fulfillment and follow up. 
-	Prospect new clients via sales calls, direct mail, email and networking events.
Job Requirement:
Requirement for Sales positions:

-	Bachelor’s Degree: Sales & Marketing or Related File. 
-	Be able to work under the pressure with high patient
-	Self-motivate and work smart.
-	Access to your own vehicle, and valid driving license is a preferable.
-	Solid ability to maintain relationship with customers 
-	Great willing.
-	High integrity

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Experiences: o	2-year of experience in training and development roles or a similar personnel position in private sector 3. Job Description: •Connect with influential network to solicit market intelligence and market comparable. •Track new Tenants in the market and significant movement or renewals in the marketplace.•Develop and execute the leasing strategy, ensuring achieve right tenant mix, maximize customer traffic and maximize property value as well as meet long-term business plan •Identify, source and secure new tenants, and work with existing right tenants to satisfy expansion/renewal requirements.•Utilize creative solutions throughout lease negotiation process by developing multiple negotiation methods and strategies to maximize property value throughout the process.•Develop, evaluate and make recommendations based on thorough Financial Analysis, ability to design, maintain and refine modeling tools.•Propose lease offers and documents on incoming and current tenancies.•Develop leasing standard process to ensure a smooth transition from the offer to lease through fit-out of leasehold improvements, and move in as well as rental billing.•Develop annual projections with regards to Leasing Term (timing, term, rate, concession package….).•Proactively communicate and manage renewal negotiations of existing tenants. Identify opportunities to maximize property value and incentivize the tenants to engage negotiations at the appropriate time. •Build and sustain strong relationships with tenants. Actively seek, listen and respond to tenants feedback to ensure alignment of their needs to our goals.•Manage and execute leasing budget and leasing revenue to ensure alignment long term business plan. •Ensure compliance with the company policy•Represent tenants to parties within organization.•Monitor leasing administration•Collaborate and consult internally to build effective relationships across departments.•Proactively enhance property image externally through industry events •Develop leasing monthly, quarterly and annual report
Job Requirement: •Post-secondary education in a related discipline•5-7 years’ experience in commercial real estate and lease management•Retail & office leasing preferred •Residential leasing an asset•Good insight of the current retail market conditions and trend including but not limited to competitors, tenants, and customers.•Be able to work in flexible schedule to handle emergencies.•Ability to read and understand blueprints, construction documents, and lease draw plans•Ability to manage, monitor and develop subordinates, delegate and follow up•Good interpersonal skills, ability to manage customer and tenant relationships•Understanding of commercial leasing, merchandising, and client needs•Solid written and verbal communications skills•Ability to deliver effective presentations•Solid financial and business acumen•Good at identifying, assessing and managing both risks and opportunities•Skills in interpreting financial data, lease documents and market research•Ability to collaborate, consult and build strong internal relationships within a organizations•Demonstrated capacity to work under pressure and to embrace change

Job Description:

Company Profile: Thriving in the Kingdom of Wonder, TPMG prides itself as Cambodia’s leading, one-stop premier property developer, transforming spaces and designing life. Our portfolio ranges from land acquisition to full-scale development, including residences, smart-technology integrated developments, and shopping malls. Company Profile: Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) or For a Child’s Smile is a non-profit organization and founded by Christian and Marie-France des Pallières, was established since 1995 in Cambodia. PSE’s mission is to help the most marginalised and debrided children escape from destitution and lead them to decent, skilled and well remunerated jobs. Job Description:
·Manages logistics/warehouse team of about 30 staff.
·Make sure safety is fully enforced and adhered in the operation.
·Makes sure effective 24/7 delivery of finished goods to customers on time, i.e. 40-60 containers per day.
·Inventory Stock Control Supervision.
·Manages and controls the packaging materials.
·Aluminum scrap reconciliation.
·Manages working capital optimization.
·Reviews work flow to optimize the efficiency, identify roadblocks and rectify.
·Import-export of finished goods and raw materials.
·Other tasks assigned by Superior.
Job Requirement:
• Degree in business administration or/and related fields
• Minimum 5 year work experience in logistics delivery management or products distribution management
• Able to manage the operation with strict safety rule compliance
• Conscientious, highly motivated with good initiative
• Familiar with SUN and other accounting systems preferable
• Self-motivated with good management skill
• Able to work under pressure and meet deadlines

= Be up to date with security vulnerabilities

Job Description:
- Organize and arrange company’s events 
- Conduct staff satisfaction survey & MAM Service Survey
- Conduct site visits and then develop report

- Excellent communication, diplomatic and organizational skills.

Job Description:
Accountability
•	Roll out digital platforms to transform the client & advisor journeys. 
•	Act as a business advisor to the technical team for the platform creation.
•	Work with the business product managers to lead the conceptualization of the platform’s design and architecture for platforms. Over time, can co-create platforms for business.
•	Assess potential markets and bringing innovations to that market as per the actual business needs.
•	Own the end-to-end customer experience for our products. In this role, you will have the freedom to run with digital application ideas and to create cutting edge and innovative products that meets the needs of our customers.
•	Maintaining platform analytics and enabling business acceptance testing
•	Take part in regional and global meetings and act as a meaningful contributor, promoting the innovation agenda
•	Enable use of available technology by promoting digital adoption within and outside the organisation
•	Oversee and facilitate the evaluation and selection of functionality, technology and application.
Job Requirement:
Competencies
•	Ability to suggest solutions to the traditional back office processes as per the new digital needs.
•	Attention to details.
•	Innovative thinking that can break down barriers and provide unique solutions.
•	Expert written and verbal communications skills. Draws conclusions and effectively communicates findings with both technical and non-technical team members, providing active leadership skills across project team and business community.
•	Strong analytical and conceptual skills; ability to create original concepts and theories for a variety of projects.
•	Trust - Ability to work in an open culture with a positive approach.
•	Flexibility – Ability to accept change and agility.
•	Exceptional interpersonal skills in areas such as teamwork, facilitation and negotiations.
•	Ability to understand the long-term ("big picture") and short-term perspectives of situations.
Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

- មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការសម្រេចនូវផែនការលក់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្ដល់អោយ
- ចេះសរសេររបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ជួនប្រធានផ្នែកលក់និងគណនេយ្យ
- តាមដានសកម្មភាពគូប្រកូតប្រជែង
- ចេះគ្រប់គ្រងស្ដុកពេលក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្ដល់អោយ
- មានភាពរួសរាយ រាក់ទាក់ និង មានទំនាក់ទំនងការងារល្អ

Company Profile: Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) or For a Child’s Smile is a non-profit organization and founded by Christian and Marie-France des Pallières, was established since 1995 in Cambodia. PSE’s mission is to help the most marginalised and debrided children escape from destitution and lead them to decent, skilled and well remunerated jobs. PSE has six main programmes adapted to the needs of the children, those programmes include: food, health, protection, education and schooling, vocational training, and helping families. PSE help children more than 6,500 and 3000 families. We are operating in Phnom Penh, Sihanouk Ville and Siem Reap.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team Technical Manager 093617555 recruitment@pse.ngo No. 402, Trea village, Sangkat Steung Meanchey, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh 093617555

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
1. What We Offer 

- An Exciting Career Opportunity with Room for Growth 

- Comfortable Work Space and Warm Company Culture 

- Multicultural Work Environment 

- Professional Development Training Opportunities 

- An Attractive Benefits Package 

- 5 days a week work schedule 



2.   Main Responsibility 

The UX/UI Designer is responsible for all design activities of the company. 

3.   Reporting and Authority 

The position will report to CTO. 

4.   Scope of Work 

Join the Corarl Team to build enterprise applications for web, desktop, and mobile platforms. 

- Create mock-up and prototypes of mobile, web, desktop interfaces of world-class software solving professionals’ everyday problems 

- Design icons, logos, leaflets, and other marketing materials 

- Develop visual representations of the interactions, site layout, navigation, controls, workflows, and prioritizations between the user and the system 

- Perform other tasks related to the position as assigned by the manager 

- Coordinate with junior UX/UI designer for marketing materials, logos, icons, and graphic design materials 

- Lead the development of the junior UX/UI designer to become more autonomous and to assist in creating mock-ups and prototypes 

Note: We will provide training in best practices in order to complete the job responsibilities.
Job Requirement:
4.  Skills and Requirements 

- Bachelor’s degree in graphic design, computer science or equivalent experience/training in the graphic arts 

- Strong design portfolio with 3-5 years design and interactive work experience  

- Proficiency in a variety of design and prototyping tools such as UXpin, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Photoshop, Illustrator, or In Vision, equivalent

- Ability to create detailed and well organized mockups and design specifications for development teams

Job Description:
- Assist audit manager for IT audit work such as prepare audit planning, audit scope, audit testing procedure plan
- Responsible for control testing and evaluated client’s internal control including identify control weakness, impact analysis and define compensation control/procedure
- Communicate IT audit finding and prepare audit reports to audit manager
- Develop and update audit work programs/checklists
- Manage the timeframe for each audit engagement as agreed to achieve the audit plan
- Monitor and evaluate progress of assistant
- Provide training and coaching to assistants
- Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•Bachelor degree in information technology/management information system or related degree.
•Good understanding of internal control, process and risk analysis, IT security and Application control knowledge
•Concepts and knowledge of IT security standards and frameworks such as COSO, COBIT, CIS ISO/IEC 27000 series
•Knowledge or experience of IT operation, IT networking, IT security and IT system 
•(such as server, database, firewall, network, software, hardware and core banking system knowledge is an advantage)
•Experience at least 2 years in IT audit or IT security
•Good written and spoken English, communication and interpersonal skills
•Ability to manage multi-task, work under pressure and less supervision

People & Culture Department

Company Profile:
About Us

Grant Thornton Cambodia is an independent member within Grant Thornton International and a wholly foreign-owned company. Grant Thornton’s presence in Cambodia first started in 2004. A reorganisation in 2011 incorporated the expertise of Grant Thornton Malaysia to expand the service lines to meet the increasing demand for quality audit and advisory services of local business and international investors in Cambodia. 

Grant Thornton has offices in more than 140 counties and  56,000 staff.

To support our continued growth, we are looking for a high calibre talented professional to manage a Client portfolio and oversee the provision of high quality audit, accounting and tax compliance services.

As a member firm of one of the largest Professional services firms in the world, Grant Thornton Cambodia continuously requires high caliber talented personnel to join our growing team.

job title: HR Director / Head of HR ___ 4000-5000$ rgent
position: HR Director / Head of HR ___ 4000-5000$ rgent
Job Description:
➢ Human Resources Strategies: Develop and implement Human 
   Resources Management strategies, policies and procedures 
   in line with the company’s guidelines as well as the 
   business needs to proactively impact and contribute to 
   the achievement of the company’s strategies and 
   objectives.
➢ Organization and Workforce Planning: Determine manpower 
   strategy and needs against current skills and 
   requirement, with appropriate policies and procedures for 
   recruitment, career and success planning, management 
   development and counseling.
➢ Recruitment: Ensure recruitment of quality staff in 
   accordance with the required manpower plans and manning 
   levels.
➢ Training and Development: Develop and implement 
   management development and training programs that will 
   facilitate the development of human resources in an 
   emerging market. The aim is to develop an efficient 
   workforce capable of supporting the business.
➢ Employee Relations: Develop and implement employee and 
   labor relations policies and guidelines to be consistent 
   with corporate philosophy, business needs and relevant 
   labor legislation to promote a harmonious and effective 
   culture.
➢ Remuneration and Reward: Retain and attract key skills 
   and enhance employee commitment and performance 
   excellence by developing and implementing appropriate 
   reward and performance management strategies.
➢ Management Team: Be a proactive participating member of 
   the management team and contribute to the managing of the 
   business to positively impact the company’s strategies 
   and objectives.
➢ HR Operations: Plan, organize, direct and manage Human 
   Resource department to achieve departmental objectives 
   and positively impact the company objectives with a cost 
   effective provision of appropriate Human Resource 
   services.
➢ Other tasks assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION:
➢ At least Master Degree in Human Resources Management or 
   other relevant Major.
KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
➢ A degree in HR management or appropriate related field.
➢ A minimum of 10 years of professional experience at a 
   management level in HR.
➢ Experience in HR policies, practices and procedures.
➢ Working knowledge of job evaluation system including the 
   use of point factor method.
➢ Human relations skills including broad and in-depth 
   experience so as to understand, recruit, retain, develop
   and motivate people.
➢ Ability to recruit and select staff up to senior level – 
   using assessment center methodology and approach.
➢ Experience in conducting management and other training 
   programs.
➢ Good negotiation and influencing skills.
➢ Technical Skill
➢ People management
➢ Coaching, mentoring and capacity building/development
➢ Crisis management
➢ Organizational awareness and service orientation
COMPETENCIES:
➢ Leadership – Forward thinking and proactive with 
   judgment, direction setting and achieving of project and 
   plan. Able to lead project, work with senior management 
   in professional way, creating a climate in which 
   employees have a desire for results and are able to 
   realize their potential.
➢ Management – Able to identify direction for self and 
   others, motivating and effectively managing staffing and 
   resource requirements. Capacity to use judgment and 
   evaluate situations in order to make decisions following 
   through to appropriate action and results.
➢ Achieving Results – Results driven, able to make sound 
   judgments over competing priorities, use initiative and 
   actively assess the course of action to set and 
   accomplish targets.
➢ Strategic Thinking – Able to identify a vision along with 
   the plans which need to be implemented to meet the end 
   goal, evaluating situations, decisions, issues in the 
   short, medium and long term.

Job Description: •	Support manager to conduct market research to identify selling possibilities and evaluate customer needs•	Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking and social media•	Participate on behalf of the company in exhibitions conferences, workshop and seminar•	Set up meetings with potential clients and listen to their wishes and concerns•	Prepare and deliver appropriate presentations on products/ services•	Negotiate/Close deals and handle complaints or objections•	Create frequent reviews and reports with sales data•	Collaborate with team to achieve better results•	Other tasks assigned by Sales & Marketing Manager.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor degree in Business Administration, Marketing or other relevant fields•	Good at English and Chinese communication is a plus advantage•	Has 1 year experiences as a condo sales or relevant role•	Good understanding of marketing and negotiating techniques•	Good knowledge in MS Office and presentation•	Self-motivated with a results-driven approach•	Aptitude in delivering attractive presentations•	Understanding real estate/property sector•	Fast learner and passion for sales.How to Apply:Interested candidates, please submit their full CVs to email: jobs@villagephnompenh.comPhone Number: 010 222 019 (Telegram)Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for face to face interview.
Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
- Explore new customers in own territory to extend business.
- ស្វែងរកអតិថិជនថ្មីនៅក្នុងតំបន់ ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានបែងចែកអោយដើម្បីពង្រើកអាជីវកម្ម

- Develop long term relationships with existing customers and new customers.
- បង្តើតទំនាក់ទំនងយូរអង្វែងអតិថិជនដែលមានស្រាប់និងអតិថិជនថ្មីៗ 

- Take orders from customers
- ទទួលបញ្ជាទិញពីអតិថិជន

- Promote company products and promotion to existing customers and newcustomers.
- ណែនាំផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលនិងកម្មវិធីពិសេសៗរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅអតិថិជនដែលស្រាប់ និងអតិថិជនថ្មីៗ

- Do daily, weekly and monthly sales reports to Sales Supervisor/ Manager.
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៏ និងប្រចាំខែ អោយប្រធានផ្នែកលក់

- Understand market, competitor activities and do report of the competitors.
- ស្វែងយល់ពីទីផ្សារ សកម្មភាពអ្នកប្រកួតប្រជែង និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៏ពីអ្នកប្រកួតប្រជែង

- Show a deep products knowledge to convince customers to buy the products
- បង្ហាញពីពត៏មាន និងផលប្រយោជន៏របស់ផលិតផលខ្លួនទៅអតិថិជន ដើម្បីលក់ផលិតផលអោយបានដាច់

- Report customers’ feedback, market development & potential, with updateson competition to supervisors and managers.
- របាយការណ៏ពីការឆ្លើយតបរបស់អតិថិជន ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៏ទីផ្សារនិងសក្តានុពលជាមួយនឹងការធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពលើការប្រកួតប្រជែងដល់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង និងថ្នាក់លើ

- Good preparation on products' display and check the expired day regularly.
- រៀបចំផលិតផលរបស់ខ្លួនអោយបានស្អាត និងផលកាលបរិច្ចេតរបស់ទំនិញ

- Be committed to achieve personal target.
- ត្រូវប្តេជា្ញចិត្តដើម្បីសំរេចគោលដៅផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន

- Be smart in solving problems
- មានភាពឆ្លាតវៃក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា

- Honest, brave, punctual, patient, and highly responsible for the job.
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ក្លាហាន គោរពពេលវេលា មានភាពអំណត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារខ្ពស់

- Other task as assigned by Supervisor & Manager
- ភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗដែលបានចាត់តាំងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង / ថ្នាក់លើ

Job Description:
** Job Purpose: The job holder is responsible for acquiring commercial customers to the Bank and achieving the sales
target. S/he must have a good understanding of banking products and services in order to sell them to
customers.

** Job Dimension: Budget (Operating/Capital): As advised by Team Leader of Commercial Banking
** Total No. of Reporting Staff:      0

** Communications & Working Relationship
- External: Customers
- Internal: Branch staff, credit department, transaction banking, operations.

** Key Responsibilities:
- Responsible for managing a portfolio of loan and deposit customers.
- Achieve and exceed assigned sales targets.
- Leverage internal and external network to acquire new-to-bank customers.
- Farm existing customer portfolio to enhance relationships via additional facilities/cash management.
- Prepare credit submissions while ensuring research and KYC is done comprehensively.
- Cross-sell transaction and consumer banking products and services
- Conduct annual reviews for customers on time
- Provide excellent service and financial advice to all customers
- Attend events/networking platforms including entertaining customers to build new relationships
Job Requirement:
** Decision Making Authority:
- As advised by Team Leader of Commercial Banking

** Knowledge Skills and Experience:
- 2-4 years relevant experience.
- Excellent communication skills.
- Enjoys building and maintaining relationships with business customers.
- Good credit knowledge and technical skills.
- Able to analyze customer financials and business models and translate the information into a brief but comprehensive write-up.
- Able to establish a total banking relationship with customers including lending, deposits and transactional services.
- Possesses existing network of >10 customers.

Job Description:
** Carry out analysis of data and provide information to support Manager, Country Procurement in meeting strategic procurement objectives.

** Key Responsibilities 
- Recommend and implement process improvement within the respective category.
- Track savings within the respective category at achieved negotiation point and projected actual savings.
- Perform sourcing activities for low value transactional initiatives, starting from market research, internal data fact finding, sourcing for suppliers, preparation of RFP documentation, process governance, analysis of commercial evaluation, negotiation on commercial & basic T&Cs of contracts, following through all the way to closure of contract and execution of contracts.
- Manage information and help data gathering to capture business requirements, service requirements and scope.
- Analyse and categorise the potential different suppliers using appropriate procurement tools.
- Understand the Bank’s supplier lists and the approval process for any new supplier who may be brought onto the Bank’s supplier database.
- Acquire data on performance reporting, collate information and agree communication plan with Manager, Country Procurement.
- Manage and ensure consistency & accuracy of all communications. Manage the frequency and type of communication meetings to be regularly undertaken in addition to written delivery.
- Develop frequent reporting to ensure common understanding of key activities undertaken or planned within the respective category.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's Degree or Professional Qualification in the relevant discipline (Accounting / Engineering / Finance / Business / Economics / Supply Chain)
- 2 years of experience of relevant Procurement background in any industry

** Functional skills
- Able to conduct procurement sourcing with minimal supervision .
- Able to lead in commercial negotiations with vendors
- Strong analytical skills
- Knowledge on basic contracts & procurement terms and conditions
- Ability to do market research

Job Description: Job Responsibilities: • Explaining the benefits of the products, goods, or services sell to new.• Sells products by establishing contact and developing relationships with prospects; recommending solutions.• Prepares reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information.• Supports team manager and performs management duties when manager is absent or out of office.• Keep knowledge Information of New Products and Services.• Maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing organization standards.• Assess customers’ needs and provide assistance and information on product features• Follow and achieve department’s sales goals on a monthly, quarterly and yearly basis.• Finds new and innovative ways of meeting the demands and needs of customers. • Makes sure that all products are in proper placement. • Ensure pricing is correct.

Job Description:
- Assist in monitoring and implementing Project Safety Plan and procedures defined by HSE Manager and Project Management Team 
- Conduct daily safety and housekeeping inspections on site and issue safety violations report to Direct works or Contractors. Inspect and rectify any unsafe behaviours and unsafe situations at worksite. 
- Carry out regular Toolbox meeting to reinforce safety awareness and measures towards direct workers or contractors 
- Review contractors’ method statement and/or safety plans on a safe working procedures point of view and check implementation on site 
- Risk assessment of the site activities to ensure good working condition of Human, Equipment and Environment. 
- Priorities will be to focus on following Main Hazards: fall of person from height, falling objects, Lifting Operations, Electricity on site.  
- Conduct accident/incident/near-misses investigation. Analyze the root cause and corrective & preventive action. 
- Keep record of accidents & near-misses reports  
- Help to collect Safety statistics from Contractors for Monthly Reporting  
- Organize Safety meeting with Contractors if and when required. Attend site progress meeting and highlight safety issues 
- Take part in analysing nonconformities and proposing corrections, determining the causes of nonconformities, and corrective and preventive action 
- Conduct routine inspection on vehicles, equipment, machinery, tools, firefighting facilities, excavations, scaffoldings, lifts, hoists & cranes etc. 
- Provide toolbox talk briefing to all workers to comply with training requirements (Project Objectives / KPIs). 
- Carry out Safety Inductions 
- Must suspend works execution immediately whenever he/she is informed of an event that could potentially endangering human safety or harming the environment.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree in Civil, Environment Engineering or a related field.- At least 1-year experiences as safety officer/Engineer in Construction Project - Experience looking after safety on high-rise building project is an advantage- Solid knowledge of Safety standards, procedures and practices on a Construction Project- Be able to use Word, Excel and PowerPoint- Be able to use English language- Good report writing skills- Strong interpersonal skills, leadership, ability to convince- Responsibility and Accountability towards People Safety- May be required to do Overtime Works- Not afraid of height- First Aid certificateWhat We OfferWe offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, Seniority pay, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.For more detail please contact recruiter: Mr. Kakada SON 067 382 832Position will be closed when it filledOnly shortlisted candidates will be contacted

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
Play a role as receptionist:
• When patient is arrived, Check ID Card, Check in, Print Treatment forms and find patient file.
• For new patient, ask patient to complete form first then register to create a new file for patient, check in and print treatment form.
• Both of action above is done then take patient with file to Nurse to take vital sign, brief chief complaint and the nurse take patient to see doctor.

Cashier:

• First verify Prescription with the file and system, make sure that is all are correct then print invoice for patient to sign for staff free, for cash payment print invoice for patient to sign and received cash.
• After seeing doctor, get medications, invoice payment sign check out patient.
• All cash received for all day have to pay to Bursar and sign received note from them.
• Hold cash float $100 for exchange in daily operation, this cash is kept in closed locker and secure place.

Insurance Patient:

• Scan Patient ID Card and print to keep in file.
• Write down in the insurance form describe about the accident, what does it happen, time, place and all kind of injury, fracture…etc.
• Print invoice for patient sign all time when patient seen by doctor.
• When the patient insurance is closed must total al the payment and issue to Bursar.

Patients file:

• Check for all patient who has seen doctor today organized file in the chat and keep in the file room.
• Check for all stationary, request to refill stock.
• Check for all patient form and copy for making a new file.
• All new patient file who is seen by doctor, print patient code to attach to file, making a new file chart then keep in the file room by swift numbers easy to find next time.  

Patients Care:
• Process patients into the Student Health Center.
• Triage patient when she/he arrived to Student Health Center.
• In case patient in not urgent or not emergency let patient wait to consult with doctor.
• In case the patient is in urgent or emergent let patient lie down in the bed, take vital sign brief chief complaint write in the chart and calling to see doctor first and complete process to help patient as soon as possible.
• For patient is not urgent or emergency, Help patient to complete patient form for new patient.
• Ask patient history, does she/he has any severe allergy with medication or food.
• Register patient’s information in to database and in the patient’s chat.
• Take vital sign, Chief Complaint, weight and high then calling to doctor to consult with patient by phone and provide treatment. 
• In case patient has accident and injuries, clean wound and do other procedure for patient.
• In case patient has trauma or fracture need to do bandage to prevent immobilization and transfer to Central MTT-SHC for further management and treatment.
• While patient in SHC, administer Medication for patient and observation as doctor’s advice.
• Nursing note and documentation in the patient note.
• Observe vital sign intake and output in case patient has vomiting, diarrhea and high fever.
• Assist patient as needed (Sponge bath to reduce fever, to bathroom, or walking…etc.). 
• To be flexible and quickly to help patient setting.
• Clean and organize all medical supplies and hand washing before and after touching patient to be prevention Nosocomial infection.
• Organize patient bed and keeping the patient’s area clean and tidy.
•  Clean and Control clinic environment in the SHC is always cleaned and hygiene.   

Pharmacy:

• Dispensary medication by doctor’s prescription and explains to patients to use for the right way at home 
•  Organize medication in the Medication Cabinet by alphabet, check for expired date, Stock control, physical count, amount of medication every week to verify with stock in database. 
•  Request order medications from MTT-SHC to refill stock.
•  Medication monthly Physical count and report to Head Nurse at Central SHC at MTT.
•  Medication is keeping safety in the cabinet and always locked.
•  Help to prepare Medication and Dispensary for Dr. Quach Mobile clinic.
•  After Dr. Quach Mobile clinic help to do physical count medication and keep it back then give statistic to Head Nurse to do report to finance and MJQF and Group of operation unit.

Medical Equipments:

• Know how to operate all medical equipment being used in Student Health Center.
• Recognize all new medical equipment and how to use it.
• Proper use medical equipment and responsibility for all of them.
• Clean and organize Medical equipment after used it and peek back the same place.
• Teaching:
• Instruction to patient how to take medication with the right way at home.
• Teach to Patient about nutrition which is related to their diseases.
• Instruction to patient to avoid alcohol during taking medication.
• Explain patient to see doctor by follow up or come back as soon if not better.
• Medical Team demonstration First Aid to teacher and student.
• Teaching to Patient for new disease, prevention and announcement.
• Teaching to student or Staff about hygiene.

Communications: Team Work:

• Work as team and communicate with receptionist front desk, Doctor, Head nurse, Laboratory to help to improve our primary care for staff, student and patients.
• Work as team to promote to sell our package to student families and staff family
•  Good relationship with customers, student and all staff in all departments. 
•  Provide First Aid for student and Staff for field trips.
Job Requirement:
• At least bachelor degree in Nursing or relevant major 
• Fresh graduate are encourage to apply
• 3 years of professional working experience in this field
• Good customer services for all patients and good communication departments
• Computer sciences Microsoft word, Excel, Power point, database, internet searching, e-mail and class lectures
• Result Driven and Proactive 
• Branch ChroyChangva.

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.
Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh.
Contact us via: (855) 12 797 939, Mon-Fri, 8:00am to 6:00pm.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
Summary of Position
Drive Chip Mong Industries L&D Team by initiating, undertaking and supporting the Training Manager in the development, implementation and evaluation of professional development programs and activities for all staff across Chip Mong Industries to support business goals.

What you will do:
•	Manage and conduct competency development plans and activities for all businesses under Chip Mong Group
•	Identify people deficiencies and propose learning solutions which contribute to business results
•	Report learning outcomes and propose remedies, if necessary
•	Act as a learning key account for designated business units and seek to understand their business needs
•	Source and assess training service providers
•	Deliver training programs, if required
•	Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
What you should have:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Education, Human Resource Management, Business, or a related field. A Master’s degree is preferred.
•	Possesses a minimum of 2 years of experience designing and developing training courses and content
•	Knowledge of competency profiling
•	Knowledge of training assessment tools and evaluation methods
•	Knowledge of instructional design, training methodologies, and knowledge management systems
•	Quickly learn the business structure.
•	Demonstrate a high level of proficiency with MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint
•	Strong presentation, written communications, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
•	Strong interpersonal and communication skills
•	Strong analytical and logical thinking skills
•	Strong attention to details
•	Ability to think creatively and innovatively
•	Ability to work under pressure.

What we offer:
We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, Seniority payment, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information Chansavat HAK  067 222 949 chansavat.hak@chipmong.com #137, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 067 222 949

- Conduct research and development of new products

- Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering or related field
- 0 to 1 year of experience in construction industry

- Good communication skills, both verbal and written in Khmer and English

company_name: TAING CHENG OING CONSTRUCTION & IMPORT EXPORT CO., LTD.
Job Description:
** Project Manager

Reporting directly to the Project Director and working closely with management team, this role is responsible for planning and overseeing a wide variety of construction projects from beginning to end. The incumbent will be working with subcontractors, engineers and architects as needed, and keeping track of an inventory of equipment and materials.  The ideal applicant will be highly organized, with the ability to plan ahead and multitask in order to meet deadlines and keep projects under budget. 

Oversee construction projects from beginning to end
Manage the budget and estimate costs
Determine the necessary equipment, materials, and manpower needed
Keep track of inventory, tools and equipment
Ensure supplies and equipment are ordered and delivered according to schedule
Prepare reports regarding job status
Evaluate risks and resolve any problems that may arise
Ensure compliance with safety regulations and building codes
Train and mentor construction workers and construction laborers
Collaborate with subcontractors, engineers, architects and key team members of the project 
Negotiate with external vendors on contract agreements
Obtain the appropriate permits and licenses from authorities for construction sites
Plan construction operations and ensure all deadlines are met
Hire contractors and staff including construction laborers
Delegate responsibilities
Allocate and manage resources to ensure that they are available when they are needed throughout the construction projects
Keep all stakeholders aware of the progress on projects and prepare progress reports regularly
Handle any environmental or local community issues that may come up during a project
Conduct site checks to monitor progress and quality standards
Job Requirement:
BSc/BA degree in Architecture, Building Science, Engineering, Construction Management, or another related field
Extensive previous work experience managing budgets for construction projects
Excellent knowledge of construction materials and equipment
Highly organized with previous experience in a leadership role 
Knowledge of MS Office Suite
Previous work experience in construction management or another similar role
Understanding of construction management processes
Able to plan ahead with excellent time management ability
Familiar with construction and project management software programs
Conflict resolution and conflict management experience
Able to multitask with a strong understanding of core manager duties
Excellent communication skills and interpersonal abilities, including negotiation skills

Job Description:
The role of Senior QS is key to the company’s future development and success in

delivering a continuous flow of new business and identifying future opportunities in both

competitive tendering and design and build projects.

The Directors seek to attract a Quantity Surveyor with broad commercial skills and a

strong background in estimating whilst understanding the commercial drivers, risk profiles

and key success factors for Clients procuring construction works. The Estimator / QS will

ensure robust, accurate and innovative advice is delivered to clients to align with their needs and business objectives.

Duties


Key Accountabilities:

Work Procurement: Monitor the market to identify work opportunities. Pursue opportunities to obtain tender documents.
Completion and submission of BOQs.

Pre-Contract:

Maintain sub-contract data base

Maintain material suppliers database

Assess tender documents to ensure sufficient information available to prepare tender
Take off quantities with accuracy and precision

Prepare and issue sub-contract enquiries and assessment of quotations upon receipt

Prepare and issue material supply enquiries and assessment of quotations upon receipt
Pricing of all element of the project including but not limited to: Piling and Foundations,

Structure, Architecture, Facades, MEP, External and Civil Works, Specialist works.
Complete tender documents for submission including notes of all exclusions and provisional sums as required.


Prepare specifications and / or Contractors proposals

Submit tenders and follow up

Post tender negotiations

Post Contract

Maintain contract documentation and advise on pre tender and post contract matters
Preparation and issue of contractual letters to clients and / or sub-contractors

Post contract liaison with clients

Carry out take offs for material procurement

Sub-contract negotiation and letting

Site measurement and progress claims

Manage and value variations

Agreement and certification of sub-contractors interim valuations and final accounts
Preparation and submission of several works final account

Agreement of final accounts
Job Requirement:
** Qualifications: Degree in quantity surveying or civil engineering and at least seven 10 years’ experience in large projects

** Skills:

Good working knowledge of forms of contract currently used within the Building and Civil

Engineering industry

Good working knowledge of standard method of measurement

Driving licence (not essential)

Excellent IT skills - particularly Excel, AUTO-CAD, Word and MS Project

Excellent communication skills and strong English

Personal Qualities:

High degree of personal motivation and able to build a team under his/her department


Commercial acumen

Ability to work as part of a close knit management team and manage numerous activities/ projects simultaneously – both short and long term.

Ability to work on own initiative and with the minimum of supervision

Outgoing personality essential for dealing directly with Clients and their design team
Excellent negotiator

Flexibility with regard to working across all areas of the business, and hours to meet the requirements of this challenging position.

Competencies:

Leadership

Enterprising and Commercial Approach

A Planned and systematic approach

Taking Responsibility

Customer Focus

Establishing and maintaining TCO systems and procedures

Building and Maintaining Relationships

Job Description:
** Draftsman (2 positions)
Reporting directly to the Project/Technical Director and working closely with project team team, this role is responsible for creating technical drawings based on given specifications and calculations of construction projects. The incumbent will be working with subcontractors, engineers and architects as needed.  The ideal applicant will be highly organized, with the ability to plan ahead and multitask in order to meet deadlines. 

** Main Duties
- Following specifications and calculations to create various technical drawings.
- Preparing rough and detailed scale plans for foundations and structures, based on preliminary concepts, sketches, engineering calculations, specification sheets and other data.
- Preparing cost estimates, contracts, bidding documents and technical reports for specific projects under Project/Technical Director’s supervision.
- Performing calculations for materials and weight limitations.
- Communicating with architects and engineers, and incorporating knowledge gained into drawings.
- Preparing, reviewing and redrafting alongside the engineering team.
- Ensuring final designs are compliant with building regulations, as well as client requirements
- Identifying and communicating potential design problems to the rest of the team.
- Performing other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
Skills/ Experiences
Bachelor of Science in Engineering or Architecture.
Experience in computer-aided design and drafting – Autocad or similar applications.
Ability to draw manually favorable, but not essential.
Ability to work well in a team and on your own.
Ability to respond well to criticism and maintain a positive attitude.
Previous work experience in construction management or another similar role
Excellent communication skills and interpersonal abilities, including negotiation skills

Company Profile:
TCO Constructions & Import Export Co., Ltd (TCO) is a one of the largest and well recognized construction company in Cambodia. Established in 2004, with clients ranging from well-known international organization such as The World Bank, ADB, other International Agencies to local companies as well as different Cambodia Government Ministries, TCO has provided Hight quality construction services specializing in road, railway, bridge, building, ports, irrigation, water treatment plant and drainage systems.

We are passionate about what we do and our partners’ success. We pride ourselves on being a quality and reputable solution provider in Cambodia for infrastructure development construction projects.  With our expansion plan, we are seeking an experienced and Competent individual to joint our company.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR HR Manager 015333037 hr@tcoconstructions.com Street 104, Preah Theat Village, Sangkat Roluos, Khan Dangkor, Phnom Penh. 015333037

Job Description: •Give direction to Structural Senior Designer/Engineer, and Structural Designer/Engineer, and all Structural Design Group members;•Prepare reports, designs and drawings;•Obtain planning and/or building regulations approval;•Inspect properties to check conditions/foundations;•Involve in the investigation and survey of build sites to determine the suitability of the earth for the requirements of the upcoming project;•Examine structures at risk of collapse and advising how to improve their structural integrity, such as recommending removal or repair of defective parts or rebuilding the entire structure;•Co-ordinate and consult with other members of their projects; •Organize and deliver materials and equipment for the needs of the construction project;•Analyse configurations of the basic structural components of a building or other structure;•Consider the strength of various materials, e.g. timber, concrete, steel and brick, to see how their inclusion may necessitate a change of structural design;•Produce drawings, specifications and computer models of structures for building contractors;•Liaise with construction contractors to ensure that newly erected buildings are structurally sound;•Liaise with other designers, including architects, to agree on safe designs and their fit with the aesthetic concept of the construction;•Liaise with government authorities in their own inspections relating to the project;•Apply expert knowledge of the forces that act on various structures.
Job Requirement: •Bachelor or Master degree in Civil/Structural engineering or related field•Skill: Civil Engineering or other equivalent degree.•Experience: 5 to 7 years of relevant experience in building construction field.•Computer Skill: Proficiency in using Ms. Office, Ms. Project, AutoCAD, Structural design software.•Language Skill: Good in verbal and written English. #Benefit:- Provide Gasoline Monthly- Remuneration: Competitive salary, incentive- Staff’s Evaluation- Health insurance- Internal Training- Staff’s uniform- Annual party- Annual Bonus- Annual leave, sick leave, and special leave- Public Holiday (Follow Cambodia Labor Law)- 13th salary- Other special discount from partner shops

Job Description:
Teacher Assistant Job Requirement

• Help kids learn skills along with the teacher.
• Assist classroom teacher with the organization of activities.
• Oversee the safety of students while in the school premise.
• Assist students with snacks, and other needs.
• Contribute to the creation of a safe and warm learning environment.
• Provide necessary assistance to the teacher.
• Keep good relationship and communication with students and teachers.
• Perform other duties assigned by teacher and principal. 

Nurse Job Requirement


•  Provides first aid care and medically prescribed services. 
•  Maintains security of school health supplies. 
•  Serves as a resource person on health issues. 
•  Provides follow-up evaluations on students as required. 
•  Recommends corrective action where problems are identified. 
•  Corresponds with parents on health needs of children. 
•  Records immunizations, health findings,and other relevant health data.
Job Requirement:
• Loving working with children.
• Previous experience is preferred.
• Good command of spoken and written English.
• Minimum qualification- High School.
• Strong knowledge of child development and needs.
• Being responsible, reliable, resourceful, creative, friendly, and dynamic.
• Seeking long-term career.
• Considerable knowledge of medical disorders and treatment. 
• Considerable knowledge of child growth and development. 
• Working knowledge of public health problems and treatment.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Sek Somonn  078 777 117 info@ngis.edu.kh #2,4, St. 156 corner 211, SangKat Veal Vong, Khan 7Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 777 117

Job Description: •Plan, manage, lead, control, MEP work team.•Ensure management of the MEP design process in accordance with company policy, procedures and the Design Management Plan.•Develop the MEP Project design brief (concept) and maintain by regular review•Manage the MEP design including all inputs, coordination and deliverables to achieve the time, cost, and quality objectives.•Arrange full construction (MEP Installation & planning) support during the design phase to maximize constructability.•Set-up & monitor a MEP design quality plan, linking Designers quality plans with a regular reviewand audit function.•Ensure that the design intent and design performance criteria are maintained through the design development and construction process.•Report immediately any event which will significantly change previous forecasts and/or seniormanagement expectations of the next forecasts.•Lead problem solving and resolution of design issues•Identify issues causing risk or delay to the project•Other tasks assigned by manager.

Job Description: •	Be responsible to manage and lead the QS Section.•	Control the cost of the projects from initial estimates, right through to the final acquisition of materials.•	Prepare the bill of quantities including breakdown detailed quantities of required materials and other related technical documents such as equipment list, construction program, and method statements and so on.•	Assess the BOQ’s received upon drawings.•	Continue quantity analysis of tender projects.•	Do feasibility studies of client requests.•	Site visit, assessments and projections for future work.•	Counter‐check all materials quantities and quality throughout - project and post-project completion.•	Tender analysis and assistance during the tendering procedures.•	Study and submit unclear drawing/information inquiries related to tender projects.•	Be able to assess cost affects when changes to the project occur; delays, variations and change orders.•	Be able to prepare a statement of final account (records the actual cost of all sections of the project).•	Identify, analyse and develop responses to commercial risks.•	Other tasks assign by assign by Manager.
Job Requirement: • Master/Bachelor degree in Architecture, Civil Engineering• At least 5 years’ experiences in QS work• Creative with good management and interpersonal skills• Able to communicate effectively both verbal graphically and writing• Possess skill in reading construction plan and estimating building and material costs• Good interpersonal and communication skills, in English and Khmer• Good negotiation and problem solving skills• Highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and within deadline• Management skills sound judgment, initiative, and flexibility• Excellent computer skills: AutoCAD, Google SketchUp, MS. Word, Excel, others
