Job Description:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងធានាបាននូវសុវត្ថិភាពក្នុងអគារ
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យរាល់ឧបករណ៍កាំមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព (CCTV) នៅក្នុងបន្ទប់ប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងអគារ
- រាយការណ៍រាល់ពត៌មានទាំងឡាយដែលទាក់ទងនឹងការស្នើសុំ
របស់អតិថិជនទៅកាន់ប្រធានផែ្នកដើម្បីរកវិធានការណ៍ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
- ជួយដោះស្រាយស្ថានការណ៍បន្ទាន់​នានា
- ជួយសំរួលនឹងប្រាប់ពីទីតាំងនានាក្នុងអគារដល់អតិថិជន
- អនុវត្តន៍ទៅតាមកាតព្វកិច្ចការងារប្រចាំខែ ព្រមទាំងការងារតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់ប្រធានក្រុម
- រាយការណ៍រាល់បញ្ហាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងបច្ចេកទេសទៅកាន់ប្រធានក្រុម
Job Requirement:
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារផ្នែកបំរើអតិថិជន សន្តិសុខ​ ឬក្នុងវិស័យសណ្ឋាគារ ១ ឬ ២ ឆ្នាំ
- មានបុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈល្អ
- មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់និងការងារ
- មានភាពឆ្លាតវៃក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
- អាចបំពេញការងារតាមវេនផ្លាស់ប្តូរ
- អាចនិយាយនឹងសរសេរភាសាខែ្មរ ឬអង់គ្លេសបានកាន់តែប្រសើរ

ព៌ត័មានសម្រាប់ដាក់ពាក្យ បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមផ្ញើនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងលិខិតពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ​មកកាន់ការិយាល័យ​៖ Exchange Square, អគារ​លេខ 19-20 ផ្លូវលេខ 106​ សង្កាត់វត្តភំ្ន ខ័ណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានី ភ្នំពេញ(ក្រោយស្ថានទួតអាមេរិក) ឬផ្ញើមកកាន់អាស័យដ្ឋានអ៊ីម៉ែល៖​ recruitment.cambodia@hkland.com ឬទូរស័ព្ទមកកាន់លេខ៖ 023​ 963​ 694
Company Profile:
Hongkong Land is a major listed property investment, management and development group. Founded in 1889, Hongkong Land’s business is built on excellence, integrity and
partnership.

The Group owns and manages more than 850,000 sq. m. of prime office and luxury retail property in key Asian cities, principally in Hong Kong, Singapore, Beijing and Jakarta. Its properties attract the world’s foremost companies and luxury brands.

The Group’s Central Hong Kong portfolio represents some 450,000 sq. m. of prime property. It has a further 165,000 sq. m. of prestigious office space in Singapore mainly held through joint ventures, a luxury retail centre at Wangfujing in Beijing, and a 50% interest in a leading office complex in Central Jakarta. The Group also has a number of high quality residential, commercial and mixed-use projects under development in cities across Greater China and Southeast Asia. In Singapore, its subsidiary, MCL Land, is a well-established residential developer.
Hongkong Land Holdings Limited is incorporated in Bermuda and has a standard listing on the London Stock Exchange, with secondary listings in Bermuda and Singapore. The
Group’s assets and investments are managed from Hong Kong by Hongkong Land Limited.
Hongkong Land is a member of the Jardine Matheson Group.

-ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល លើមុខជំនាញបន្ថែម

Job Description: •Perform all daily inspection to achieve the quality of construction required in the drawings and specifications for all works.•Develop method statement for the activity including risk assessment, job safety environmental analysis and checklist based on specifications of the project.•Determine all standards to perform inspection and tests on all procedures and oversee all testing methods and maintain high standards of quality for all processes;•Prepare daily QA/QC report regarding inspections, materials, etc.•Other tasks assigned by Supervisor.
Job Requirement: •Bachelor’s degree in civil engineering or equivalent degree.•Minimum 2 years’ experience as QA/QC Engineer.•Be able to use Auto CAD, Ms. Office, Word, Excel, Power Point and relevant program;•Strong construction knowledge and ability to control the quality and cost;•Be able to use English language•Good at problems solving, negotiation and site management•Be friendly, flexible, honestly, patient, punctual, hardworking, and be able to work under pressure.•Be able to use AutoCAD 2D, MS. Office, Internet & E-mail or related programs.#Benefit:- Provide Gasoline Monthly- Remuneration: Competitive salary, incentive- Staff’s Evaluation- Health insurance- Internal Training- Staff’s uniform- Annual party- Annual Bonus- Annual leave, sick leave, and special leave- Public Holiday (Follow Cambodia Labor Law)- 13th salary- Other special discount from partner shops
Company Profile:
Amory Development is on of the leading real estate developers cater to the increasing demand of high-quality property development and has over 6 years of experience in real estate sector. Our current projects are Amory 7 Mkara and at National Road 6A(Bridge9) and Amory Sen Sok at center of Sensok District. Amory Development has since diversified its business and transformed the company to include prominent F&V, Retail, Food Manufacturing and construction Material supplies.

Types of our products & services

-Wire mesh Factory
-Ready -mixed concrete

-LUNA coffee and bakery

Job Description:
** GAEASYS - http://www.gaea-sys.com we are people creating beautiful software. We develop software for established companies, promising startups & partner with agencies big and small.

Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Nita  096 48 08 435 nita.hok@gaea-sys.com #105 ជាន់ទី4​ បន្ទប់លេខ1​​​ ផ្លូវ1984A ក្រុមទី1 ភូមិ​ ភ្នំពេញថ្មី ខណ្ឌសែនសុខ​ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ​ 096 48 08 435

Job Description:
1.Job Purpose/គោលបំណងនៃការងារ៖
The Restaurant Manager will lead and manage restaurant team to pleases customers by providing a pleasant dining experience in according to company’s vision & mission.

ប្រធានភោជនីយដ្ឋានត្រូវដឹកនាំ និងចាត់ចែងក្រុមការងារផ្នែកសេវាកម្មដើម្បីបំរើសេវាកម្មបំពេញចិត្ត អតិថិជនអោយបានល្អ ដោយបង្កើតនូវបរិយាកាសល្អក្នុងការពិសារអាហារដល់អតិថិជន ដូចបានចែងក្នុង ទស្សនៈវិស័យ និងបេសកកម្មរបស់ភោជនីយដ្ឋាន។


Key Accountabilities/តួនាទីផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនសំខាន់ៗ៖
-Supervise day-to-day restaurant operations to ensure that service delivery is made at the highest standards.
-ត្រួតពិិនិត្យ គ្រប់គ្រងប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់ហាងដើម្បីធានាអោយបានថាការងារបំរើសេវាកម្ម មានភាពរលូន និងតាមស្តង់ដារដ៏ល្អដែលបានកំណត់ និងបង្ហាត់បង្ហាញ។

-Keep excellent quality of service for customers
-រក្សាអោយបាននូវគុណភាពសេវាកម្មដ៏ប្រពៃជូនដល់អិតិជន។

-Maintain excellent relationship with all restaurant guests during service hours
-រក្សាអោយបាននូវទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជននៅគ្រប់ម៉ោងប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍។

-Be responsible for the daily opening & closing of restaurant operation.
-ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការបើក និងបិទហាងអោយបានទៀងម៉ោងដែលបានកំណត់។

-Be responsible for daily cash management from restaurant sales
-ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងការទូទាត់សាច់ប្រាក់ពីការលក់ទៅអោយផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ។

-Provides Management information regarding client satisfaction and activities of competition
-ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ និងពត៌មានដល់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងនូវកំរិតនៃការពេញចិត្តរបស់អតិថិជន និង សកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗនៃដៃគូរប្រកួតប្រជែងតាមដែលអាចធ្វើទៅបាន។

-Plan & uses all resources, labor, material and equipment effectively
-ធ្វើផែនការ និងប្រើប្រាស់នូវរាល់ធនធាន កំលាំងពលកម្ម ឧបករណ៍ បរិក្ខារផ្សេងៗអោយមាន ប្រសិទិ្ធខ្ពស់។


-Completes daily & weekly inspection on overall outlets’ appearance - the maintenance of all fixtures, fittings and operating equipment and other operational excellence as per provide list by line manager.
-ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍នូវរាល់បរិយាកាសហាង ដោយរក្សានូវគ្រឿងសង្ហារឹម ឧបករណ៍បំពាក់ផ្សេងៗ បរិក្ខារសំរាប់ប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍ និងចំណុចផ្សេងៗក្នុងការដំណើរការហាងដូច ដែលបានកំណត់ជូន។

-Attends to guest complaints, requests or inquiries regarding food and services and immediately takes all required corrective measures.
-ចូលដោះស្រាយនូវបញ្ហារបស់អតិថិជន ក៏ដូចជាការស្នើសុំ ការសាកសួរពត៌មាននានា ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងអាហារ ឬសេវាកម្ម ហើយត្រូវរកដំណោះស្រាយភ្លាមៗតាមដែលអាចធ្វើទៅបាន។

-Stabilize, enforce and improve existing policy and procedures, including policy of grooming, security, discipline, etc.
-រក្សាស្ថេរភាព ពង្រឹង និងកែលំអនូវរាល់គោលការណ៍ និងបែបបទការងារផ្សេងៗរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន រួម បញ្ចូលទាំងគោលការណ៍នៃការតុបតែងខ្លួន សន្តិសុខផ្ទៃក្នុង និងវិន័យ។ល។

-Manage and motivate the restaurant team.
-គ្រប់គ្រង និងលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់ក្រុមការងារសេវាកម្ម។

-Supervise the renewal of menus by working closely with Chef and Line Manager
-គ្រប់គ្រង និងបន្ថែមនូវមុខអាហារដោយត្រូវធ្វើការងារយ៉ាងជិតស្និទ្ធិជាមួយប្រធាន និងផ្នែកចុងភៅ។

-Assist line manager to prepare and review annual budget, prepare monthly/annual reports
-ជួយដល់ប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋានក្នុងការរៀបចំ និងពិនិត្យថវិកាប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ក៏ដូចជាជួយរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។

-Prepares weekly & monthly restaurant report to management.
-រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែជូនដល់ប្រធានជាទៀងទាត់។
-Up to date and develop an attractive with profitable menu & List
-រៀបចំម៉ឺនុយមុខម្ហូបនិងភេសជ្ជះអោយមានសោភណ័ភាពនិងសន្ទស្សន៍ប្រាក់ចំណេញ

-Assist line manager in recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, coaching, counseling communicating job expectations, , assigning, scheduling, and disciplining employees.
-ជួយដល់ប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋានក្នុងការសំភាស ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក បង្ហាត់បង្ហាញ ហ្វឹកហ្វឺនបណ្តុះ បណ្តាល ផ្តល់ករប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ បញ្ជាក់ពីការងារដល់បុគ្គលិក ចាត់ចែងវេនការងារ និងចាត់ការ ផ្នែកវិន័យការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិក។

-Assist line manager in planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions.
-ជួយដល់ប្រធានយកដ្ឋានក្នុងការធ្វើផែនការ ត្រួតពិនិត្យ វាយតំលៃការងាររបស់បុគ្គលិក។

-Perform other duties assigned by F&B Manager as much as required
-បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗដែលចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋាននៅពេលដែលត្រូវការ។

3.Key Result Areas/លទ្ធផលសំខាន់ៗដើម្បីវាស់វែងប្រសិទិ្ធភាពការងារ៖
-Customer’s Satisfaction/ការពេញចិត្តរបស់អតិថិជន
-Total restaurant sales revenue/ចំណូលពីការលក់របស់ភោជនីយដ្ឋាន
-Number of customer’s walk-in/ចំនួនអតិថិជនមកទទួលសេវាកម្មនៅភោជនីយដ្ឋាន
-Average customer’s pocket share/ចំណាយជាមធ្យមរបស់អតិថិជនម្នាក់ៗ
-Excellence of operational index/សន្ទស្សន៍នៃគុណភាពប្រតិបតិ្តការណ៍ហាង
-Optimal operational cost within department/ចំណាយនៃប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែក
-Efficiency of service, ordering & billing process/ប្រសិទិ្ធភាពនៃសេវាកម្ម ការកុំម៉្មង់ម្ហូប និងការគិតលុយ
Job Requirement:
-Minimum 6 years of working experience for hotel/restaurants and at least 3 year in management level/មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងតិច ៦ឆ្នាំក្នុងវិស័យបដិសណ្ឋារកិច្ច និងយ៉ាង តិច ៣ឆ្នាំក្នុងការងារគ្រប់គ្រង។
-Reasonable Appearanc/ រូបសម្បតិ្តិសមរម្យ
-Bachelor degree in hospitality or in equivalent/បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកបដិសណ្ឋារកិច្ច ឬកំរិត ប្រហាក់ប្រហែលគ្នា
-Good command in English or Plus Chinese is better /ចេះនិយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ
-Basic Microsoft Office & able to use email/internet/ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ អុីម៉េល និងអិនធឺនេត
-Strong leadership with managerial talent, able to coach and motivate all staff/មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដឹកនាំ និងគ្រប់គ្រង និងមានជំនាញក្នុងការបង្ហាត់ និងលើកទឹកចិត្ត បុគ្គលិក
-Excellent organisational skills មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការចាត់ចែង និងគ្រប់គ្រងក្រុមការងារ
-Honest, hardworking, flexible, highly responsible and able to work as team & independently មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ប្រឹងប្រែងការងារ មានភាពបត់បែន មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវ និងចេះធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងដោយឯករាជ្យ
-Customer service oriented ជាបុគ្គលដែលមានភាពរួសរាយ និងចូលចិត្តផ្នែកបដិសណ្ឋារកិច្ច
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   097 49 51 268(Telegram) molindeth@gmail.com # 299, Street Oknha Ming Rithy , Phnom Penh Thmey , Khan Sensok , Phnom Penh. 097 49 51 268(Telegram)

Job Description:
─  រៀបចំផែនការការងារ យុទ្ធសាស្រ្តលក់សម្រាប់ក្រុម
─  ដឹកនាំ តាមដានការងារបុគ្គលិក និងជម្រុញលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់ក្រុមការងារដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅរួមដែលបានកំណត់ដោយក្រុមហ៊ុន
─  គ្រប់គ្រង និងរៀបចំចាត់ចែងការងារទៅដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្នាក់ក្រោមស្របទៅតាមលំដាប់ថ្នាក់ការងារ និងចំណេះដឹងរបស់បុគ្គលិកម្នាក់ៗ
─  រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពលក់ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក
─  រៀបចំការប្រជុំប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែដើម្បីតាមដានលទ្ធផលការងារក្រុម និងដាក់ឲ្យអនុវត្តន៍ផែនការបន្ទាប់
─  ជួយក្រុមក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជាមួយអតិថិជន បញ្ហាក្នុងក្រុម និងបញ្ហាទាក់ទងនឹងការលក់ ។
─  ជួយណែនាំក្រុមការងារពីរបៀបធ្វើការងារជាមួយអតិថិជនទាក់ទងទៅនឹងការលក់ និងការផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មទៅកាន់អតិថិជនុ។
─  ឆ្លើយតបរហ័សចំពោះសំណួររបស់អតិថិជន និងទំនាក់ទំនងបានល្អនៅក្នុងក្រុម ។
─  សម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅដែលដាក់ដោយអគ្គនាយបានផ្តល់ឱ្យ ។
─  ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែរួចផ្ញើជូននាយកប្រតិបត្តិ
─  កត់ត្រាព័ត៌មាន ឬមតិយោបល់ត្រឡប់ពីអតិថិជន
─  ការងារផ្សេងទៀតចាត់ចែងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង .................
Job Requirement:
─  អាយុ ២៥ ~ ៣៥ ឆ្នាំ
─  បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកលក់-ទីផ្សារឬមុខជំនាញដែលជាប់ទាក់ទងលក់ទីផ្សារ។
─  មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច 1 ឆ្នាំផ្នែកលក់ឬផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ
─  មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងខ្លាំងរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់និងស្វាគមន៍
─  មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អនិងបង្ហាញជំនាញសេវាកម្មអតិថិជន
─  អាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធនិងពូកែធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
─  មានចំណេះដឹងអំពីកម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រឈុតការិយាល័យ Microsoft
─  ពូកែសរសេរ / និយាយ / ស្តាប់ភាសាអង់គ្លេស។
─  ស្មោះត្រង់ស្មោះត្រង់និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើការងារ

Job Description: •	Successfully implement a strategy set up and execution planning of new QA/QC Department under the management of QA/QC Manager.•	Set up of necessary and reasonable organization plan and major employee assignment schedule under the management of QA/QC Manager.•	Implement the real job with team work.•	Instruct and supervise the construction site•	Conduct inspection regularly and policing to maintain Quality both on materials and works•	Do temporary plan and estimation•	Instruct and support of the preparation’s construction•	Execute monthly report to QA/QC manager.•	Other tasks assign by Supervisor/Manager
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or related field.•	3 years' experience as QA/QC engineer of construction site.•	Confident, assertive and independent.•	Strongly experienced with Microsoft Office, internet and email and design software program (Auto Cad 2D & 3D, etc…)•	Excellent communication and negotiation skill.•	Relationship building and people management skill.•	Good interpersonal skill.•	Very good command of speaking, reading and writing in English.
Company Profile:
Amory Development is on of the leading real estate developers cater to the increasing demand of high-quality property development and has over 6 years of experience in real estate sector. Our current projects are Amory 7 Mkara and at National Road 6A(Bridge9) and Amory Sen Sok at center of Sensok District. Amory Development has since diversified its business and transformed the company to include prominent F&V, Retail, Food Manufacturing and construction Material supplies.

-Real Estate Development
-Wire mesh Factory

-LUNA coffee and bakery

Job Description: •Assist project manager or site manager in execution of all technical works and site management.•Manage materials and work force in daily operation•Check works in compliance with drawing and meet standard•Coordinate and supervise construction work at the site•Monitor and examine all technical works and site management.•Manage workers’ daily performance and solve the problem at Site.•Revise/Detail/Shop drawing for all technical work.•Be responsible for monthly progress report and progress evaluation claim.•Monitor daily on the contractor/sub-contractor’s work.•Ensure work quality of construction and in accordance with time lines of the project.•Supervise all documents related to site drawings, specifications and Bill of Quantity.•Manage site equipment/materials and coordinate with stakeholders.•Other tasks assign by assign by Project/Site Manager.
Job Requirement: •Bachelor degree in Civil Engineering or related fields•3-5 years’ experience in construction site management.•Good knowledge of building methods and regulation•Understanding of complex drawings•Leadership skills•Team building & motivation skills•Problem solving skills•Negotiation and Communication skills•Time Management and organization Skills

Job Description: •Assist to manage and push up progress of construction work;•Monitor the construction schedules;•Check the construction progress and quality of construction;•Ensure that all materials used and work performed are as per specifications.•Give advice and check technical work with sub-contractors and team members such as technician and workers;•Oversee quality control, health and safety matter on site;•Coordinate with sub-contractors regarding any issues or any problem that may occur;•Check and control construction materials;•Other tasks assign by Supervisor/Site Manager.

Job Description:
Job Description:
o Designing, maintaining, implementing or improving eletrcial instruments, facilities, components, equipment products, or systems for industrial, commercial or domestic purpose 
o Performing a wide range of engineering tasks by operating computer-assisted design or engineering software and equipment 
o Conferring with customers, engineers, and others to discuss existing or potential engineering products or projects 
o Ensuring that installation and operation conform to standard and customer requirement by preparing electrical systems specifications, technical drawing or topographical maps 
o Establishing construction, manufacturing or installation standard or specification b performing a wide range of detailed calculations 
o Ensuring compliance with specification, codes, or customer requirements by directing or coordinating installation, manufacturing, construction, maintenance, documentation, support or testing activities
o Writing reports and compiling data regarding existing and potential electrical engineering projects and studies
o Preparing specification for purchases of electrical equipment and material 
o Supervising or training project team members 
o Estimating material, labour, or construction costs for budget preparation 
o Maintaining electrical equipment 
o Working with variety of technicians
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor Degree in electrical engineering degree from an accredited school 2 or 3 years already 
o Experience in using or a desire to learn required software
o Renovation project is a plus 
o Having 4 to 5 years of experience  
o Knowledge of applicable codes related to electronic engineering 
o Proficient in design and calculation software   
o Sex: Open  
o Age: Open 

Working Hour/day:
• Working days	: Monday – Saturday (Morning)
• Working Hours: 8:00AM ~ 5:00PM (Lunch break 12:00PM – 1:00PM)

Other Benefit: 
o Annual Leave	 
o OT 
o 13th Month Salary 
o Package allowance (When staff need to go province, company will pay for food and accommodation)

Job Description: •Responsible for developing and designing internal relevant projects.•Developing concept design into construction drawing.•Producing 2D drawing and modeling 3D from concept to construction drawing.•Monitor and cross check for all external project drawing designs.•Site inspection (checking and correcting) during construction and progress reports.•Provide technical solution when problems occur during construction progress.•Work directly with line managers as well as top management.•Ensure project deadline is met.•Report weekly progress of the project to line manager.
Job Requirement: •Female/Male•Bachelor Degree in Architecture or relevant field.•At least 2-years experiences in similar position.•Be creative/innovative.•Able to use computer application (AutoCAD, 3D Studio Max + Rendering plug-in, SketchUp +Vray, Adobe Photoshop, Lumion, Adobe Indesign, Ms. Office).•Able to do hand sketching.•Good communication, friendly and welcoming person.•Able to work under pressure, as a team and individual.•Self-confident.•Ability to change direction in response to a fluctuating work environment.•Good behavior, hardworking, flexible, honest and self-motivated. •Strong knowledge in professional skill.•Good in writing, speaking and listening English (Chinese is a plus).

Job Description: •Responsible for developing and designing internal relevant projects.•Developing concept design into construction drawing.•Producing 2D drawing and modeling 3D from concept to construction drawing.•Monitor and cross check for all external project drawing designs.•Site inspection (checking and correcting) during construction and progress reports.•Provide technical solution when problems occur during construction progress.•Work directly with line managers as well as top management.•Ensure project deadline is met.•Report weekly progress of the project to line manager.
Job Requirement: •Female/Male•Bachelor Degree in Architecture or relevant field.•At least 2-years experiences in similar position.•Be creative/innovative.•Able to use computer application (AutoCAD, 3D Studio Max + Rendering plug-in, SketchUp +Vray, Adobe Photoshop, Lumion, Adobe Indesign, Ms. Office).•Able to do hand sketching.•Good communication, friendly and welcoming person.•Able to work under pressure, as a team and individual.•Self-confident.•Ability to change direction in response to a fluctuating work environment.•Good behavior, hardworking, flexible, honest and self-motivated. •Strong knowledge in professional skill.•Good in writing, speaking and listening English (Chinese is a plus).

Job Description:
 Participate in strategic & long-term planning of the 
  Company strategic direct investment projects including 
  land acquisitions, divestments, project finance and 
  mergers and acquisitions.
 Screen, evaluate and execute investment opportunities 
  that comply with the request from Management team, 
  including private equity, and direct or co-investment 
  opportunities.
 Oversee and endorse land valuations using various 
  methodologies including, but not limited to, 
  discounted cash flow, direct comparison (with accurate 
  market comparable) or depreciated replacement cost 
  (when doable), foster valuation process improvements
 Carry out feasibility studies and present 
  recommendations pertaining to potential land 
  developments, collaborate and work closely with the 
  Acquisition Department to present detailed reports and 
  analysis, support draft and presentation of all 
  investment proposals
 Lead market studies and researches pertaining to 
  lands, residential & commercial real estates in areas 
  such as offer, demand, pricing, trends, market 
  constraints & practices
 Design surveys pertaining to direct and indirect 
  competitors’ positioning and strategies
 Compile and archive data, build consulting 
  capabilities serving company’s investment and 
  development projects, monitor actual market forces, 
  new entrants and entry modes
 Understand and proactively detect emerging trends and 
  shifts in local/regional lifestyles
 Evaluate the competitive landscape by preparing 
  benchmarking analysis and evaluation in regards to 
  Cambodia and other neighboring markets in the Great 
  Mekong Sub region
 Contribute to project conceptualization phase, project 
  branding and marketing strategy
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor’s degree or above in Real Estate, Property 
  Development or related fields,
 Minimum 7 years of working experience in property 
  valuation for the purposes, joint venture, bank 
  security, secured lending, tax audit and property 
  development
 Fluent in at least two of the following languages – 
  English, Chinese and Khmer.
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills as well 
  as critical and logical thinking skills
 Good communication, oral & written, strong analytical, 
  interpersonal & leadership skills
 Understand the local business conditions & complexity 
  of doing valuation in Cambodia

        management

Job Description:
- Take the lead of scrum teams as the Product Owner
- Providing vision and direction to the Agile development team and stakeholders throughout the project and create requirements
- Ensure that the team always has an adequate amount of prior prepared tasks to work on
- Plan and prioritize product feature backlog and development for the product
- Define product vision, road-map and growth opportunities
- Assess value, develop cases, and prioritize stories, epics and themes to ensure work focuses on those with maximum value that are aligned with product strategy
- Provide backlog management, iteration planning, and elaboration of the user stories
- Work closely with Product Management to create and maintain a product backlog according to business value or ROI
- Lead the planning product release plans and set the expectation for delivery of new functionalities
- Provide an active role in mitigating impediments impacting successful team completion of Release/Sprint Goals
- Research and analyze market, the users, and the roadmap for the product
- Follow our competitors and the industry
- Keep abreast with Agile/Scrum best practices and new trends
Job Requirement:
- Previous working experience as a Product Owner for 2 years
- BA in Computer Science, Engineering or similar relevant field
- In-depth knowledge of Agile process and principles
- Outstanding communication, presentation and leadership skills
- Excellent organizational and time management skills
- Sharp analytical and problem-solving skills
- Creative thinker with a vision
- Attention to details

Benefit:
- Working Hours: Mon-Fri, 8AM-5PM
- Annual Staff Retreat
- 2-3 times party per year
- Coffee Corner (free coffee) for relax and discussion
- Yearly bonus by KPI
- 2 times performance feedback by manager to improve your skill and performance
- Seniority payment (ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ)
- Yearly salary review and promote 1-2 times per year if excess expectation and performance
- NSSF (Accident & Health)

• Manage & setup Linux servers

• support the roll-out of new applications by set up new users' accounts profiles and deal with password issues
• respond within agreed time limits to call-outs
• work continuously on a task until completion (or referral to third parties, if appropriate)
• Monthly report to direct supervisor

• At least 2-year experience as IT Technical Support
• Strong enough with networking and firewall filter
• Problem-solving and communication skills

• MikroTik or Cisco is a plus
• Be able to work individually and in the team.

job title: Java Backend developer, Mobile Developer, System Engineer ($300 ~ $1200)
position: Java Backend developer, Mobile Developer, System Engineer ($300 ~ $1200)
Job Description:
We are recruiting total 10 of beginner and experienced developers.

::Job Domain::
(1) Banking System(CoreBanking/ExternalSystem/Card/ATM and so on) Development
(2) Data Analytics Platform Development
(3) System Monitoring Development
(4) Mobile Hybrid App Development


::Required Abilities in common::
(1) People who are able to fix bugs and improve features of existing software.
(2) People who are creative for problem solving and bug fixing where it comes from a related task.
(3) People who are able to work under high pressure with tough deadlines.
(4) People who are able to work well in a team environment.
(5) People who are able to quickly adapt and learn new technologies and systems.
(6) People with good interpersonal and communication skills or possibilities

::Requirements - Android/iOS Developer (Beginner/Experienced)::
(1) BA in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent 
(2) 2+ year experience in Android or iOS development for the beginners
(3) 4+ year experience in Android or iOS development for the experienced
(4) Broad knowledge on (J2SE for Android Developer/Objective C for iOS Developer)
(5) Design concept: OOP Paradigm, Design Pattern
(6) Knowledge in Thread programming is a plus
(7) Knowledge about Javascript and jQuery is a plus
(8) Experience in development with IONIC2/AngularJS is a plus

::Requirements - Beginner Java Developer::
(1) BA in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent 
(2) Core Java knowledge including design patterns and web frameworks
(3) Core Javascript knowledge including JQuery and some other javascript libraries
(4) Experience working on Windows / Linux systems
(5) Experience with client-side technologies like HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery

::Requirements - Experienced Java Developer::
(1) BA/MA in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent 
(2) 5+ years experience in Java based Enterprise application development using Spring framework.
(3) Advanced Java knowledge including design patterns and web frameworks
(4) Database development and design skills using SQL Server, MySQL and PostgreSQL
(5) Database query tuning skills to improve performance using SQL Server, MySQL and PostgreSQL
(6) Experience working on Windows / Linux systems.
(7) Experience with client-side technologies like HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery

::Requirements - System Engineer::
(1) BA in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent 
(2) 2+ Years of Professional Software Engineering Experience
(3) Experience with system monitoring
(4) WAS experience like Tomcat and JBoss 
(5) Experience in installing configuration and troubleshooting Linux/Windows based environments 
(6) Experience with PostgreSQL, MySQL and SQL Server
Job Requirement:
::Required Skill Set for Java Developer::
(1)Language : Java
(2)Technology : Spring, Spring MVC, Spring Security, MyBatis,Javascript, JQuery
(3)OS : Windows, Linux/Unix
(4)Tools : Jenkins, Gradle, Maven, Ant
(5)DBMS/NoSQL : Postgresql, Oracle, MSSQL, MariaDB, 
(6)Web Server : Apache Http Server
(7)WAS : JBoss, Tomcat
(8)IDE : Eclipse EE

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
1.	Ensure a high level of internal and external customer service. Investigate (and correct) customer issues and complaints relating to quality. 
2.	Supervise workers engaged in inspection and testing activities to ensure high productivity and high technical integrity. 
3.	Develop and analyze statistical data and product specifications to determine standards and to establish quality and reliability expectancy of finished products. 
4.	Provide technical and statistical expertise to teams. 
5.	Formulate, document and maintain quality control standards and on-going quality control objectives. 
6.	Coordinate objectives with production procedures in cooperation with other head of QC or plant managers to maximize product reliability and minimize costs. 
7.	Create, document and implement inspection criteria and procedures. 
8.	Interpret quality control philosophy to key personnel within MLCB factory. 
9.	Apply total quality management tools and approaches to analytical and reporting processes. 
10.	 Maintain active role on internal continuous improvement teams. 
11.	Design, develop and implement quality control training programs. 
12.	Ensure complete compliance to prescribed QMS, GMP’s 
13.	Ensure compliance with Health and Safety policies, systems and processes
14.	Others task assigned by head of QC
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in field related 
- Male or Female
- Open to all local and expat 
- At least 3-5 years with garment is preferably intimate apparel
- Proficient in Microsoft Office, including Excel, Word & PowerPoint
- Fluent and conversational English Skill and Chinese language will be advantage

position: អ្នកត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាព  Quality Assurance (QA)
Job Description: 1-  រៀបចំប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារ 5s និង GMP2-  បង្កើតទំរង់ឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធទៅនឹងប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារ 5s និង GMP ដើម្បីទទួលបានសញ្ញាប័ត្រក្នុងរយៈពេល៦ខែ។3-  បង្កើតទំរង់ឯកសារដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ (ផ្នែកផលិតកម្ម ឃ្លាំង និង ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស)ដែលត្រូវកត់កំណត់ត្រារបាយការណ៍ឲ្យផ្នែកត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពរក្សាទុកសម្រាប់ Auditor មកត្រួតពិនិត្យ។4-  ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពផលិតផល អនាម័យនិងការសម្អាតក្នុងផលិតកម្ម។5-  ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពវត្ថុធាតុដើមចូល អនាម័យនិងការសម្អាតកន្លែងរក្សាទុកក្នុងឃ្លាំង។6-  ត្រួតពិនិត្យសត្វចង្រៃផ្សេងៗដែលមានក្នុងតំបន់ផលិត។7-  រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗសម្រាប់ណែនាំ បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និង ការអនុវត្តផ្ទាល់ដើម្បីឲ្យផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ (ពិសេសកម្មករ) ឲ្យយល់ដឹងពីគោលការណ៍នឹងប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារ 5s និង GMP។8- ​ កែលម្អនិងបង្កើតថ្មី នូវលំហូរផលិត ដើម្បីឲ្យលទ្ធផលនៃការផលិតកាន់តែកើនឡើង។9-  ធ្វើឲ្យផលិតផលមានអនាម័យខ្ពស់ និង ត្រឹមត្រូវតាមស្តង់ដារចំណីអាហារ។10- ​ ដឹកនាំក្រុម និង បុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្កាប់ ដើម្បីសម្រេចបានវិញ្ញាបត្រប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារ។11-  ធ្វើផែនការរៀបចំប្រព័ន្ធសហប្រតិបត្តិការនិងទំរង់ឯកសារផ្សេងៗដើម្បីឲ្យក្រុមហ៊ុនក្លាយជាក្រុមហ៊ុនស្តង់ដារ។
Job Requirement: 1- បរិញ្ញាបត្រវិស្វករចំណីអាហារ2- ប្រើភាសាអគ្លេសបានគួរសម អាចអាន សរសេរ និង​ បកប្រែបាន3- អត់ធ្មត់ តស៊ូ ហ៊ានសម្រេចចិត្ត ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា4- ផ្តោតលើលទ្ធផលការងារ5- មានសមត្តភាពចេះធ្វើការជាមួយផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ និង ជាងធ្វើនំ6- មានសមត្តភាពចេះស្វែងរកគំនិតថ្មីៗសម្រាប់អភិវឌ្ឍក្រុមហ៊ុន7- ចេះធ្វើខ្លួនជាគំរូដល់កូនក្រុម​ ផ្នែកផលិតកម្ម និង ផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ

Job Description: តម្រូវការការងារ- មិនគិតពីកម្រិតវប្បធម៌- មិនទាមទារបទពិសោធការងារ(បើមានរឹតតែល្អ)- មានចំណង់ចំណូលចិត្តខាងផ្នែកធ្វើនំ- អត់ធ្មត់ ស្មោះត្រង់ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារម៉ោងការងារ- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏- ម៉ោងការងារ ម៉ោង០៧:៣០ព្រឹក ដល់ម៉ោង០៥:០០ល្ងាច
Job Requirement: អត្ថប្រយោជន៍- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារ- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធ- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀតមានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវបានទាក់ទងសម្រាប់ការសំភាសន៍។ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ របស់អ្នកទុកជាឯកសារមួយ។ ដាក់ឈ្មោះឯកសាររបស់អ្នកដូចតទៅ: ឈ្មោះ_មុខដំណែងស្នើសុំ_កាលបរិច្ឆេទដាក់ពាក្យ (ឈ្មោះ = ឈ្មោះពេញរបស់អ្នក) ។ ឧទាហរណ៏: លី ដារ៉ា_បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់_ថ្ងៃទី30 ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ2019។ សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនឹងអត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ សំបុត្រកំណើត និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារដែលមានភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍។
Company Profile: Bayon Bakery is a local and one of the leading bakeries in Cambodia and was established in 1998. In order to fulfill customer's demands, we have expanded our stores to 12 branches in Phnom Penh with our signature Num Pang Bayon, Bakyong Bayon, cake, wedding cake, and a wide range of fresh baked products.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  070555337 hr@bayonbakery.com Phnom Penh House 88, Street 598, Sangkat Toul Sangke, KhanRersey Keo, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070555337

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់ ខាងក្នុង​និងក្រៅហាង​​(ភ្នំពេញនិងតាមបណ្តាខេត្ត)
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់ ខាងក្នុង​និងក្រៅហាង​​(ភ្នំពេញនិងតាមបណ្តាខេត្ត)
Job Description:
- ស្វែងរកនិងកំណត់អតិថិជនគោលដៅ
- រៀបចំការណាត់និងចុះជួបអតិថិជនដោយផ្ទាល់
- ពន្យល់ណែនាំនូវទំនិញនិងសេវាកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដល់អតិថិជន
- ស្វែងយល់ពីតំរូវការរបស់អតិថិជន
- រៀបចំផែនការនិងយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រលក់ដើម្បីធានាអោយបាននូវគោលដៅលក់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
- ពង្រីកសក្តានុពលទីផ្សារអោយកាន់តែធំទូលាយ
- រៀចំរបាយការណ៏ប្រចាំ ថ្ងៃ និងសប្តាហ៏
- យកចិត្តទុកដាក់និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពពត៏មានថ្មីៗដល់អតិថិជន
- បំពេញភារកិច្ចចាំបាច់ផ្សេងៗដែលត្រូវបានប្រគល់ដោយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ
Job Requirement:
- រូបសម្បតិ្តសមរម្យ
- មានសេចក្តីក្លាហាន ឈ្លាសវៃ ច្នៃប្រឌិតនិងទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
- ត្រៀមលក្ខណះគ្រប់គ្រាន់ដើម្បីប្រកួតប្រជែងទីផ្សារ
- សញ្ញាប័ត្រទុតិយភូមិ និស្សិតមហាវិទ្យាល័យឬបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ
- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេស (សរសេរ និយាយ​ អាន និងស្តាប់បាន)
- ចំណេះដឹងមូលដ្ធានផ្នែកកុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft Word Excel) 
- មានបទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកលក់ផលិតផល
- អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុមនិងផ្តល់លទ្ធផលតាមពេលវាលាកំណត់បាន
- អាចធ្វើដំណើរទៅលក់នៅតាមខេត្តបាន
- ធ្ចើការ៨ម៉ោងក្នុង១ថ្ងៃនិង៦ថ្ងៃក្នុង១សប្តាហ៏

*** អត្ថប្រយោជន៏់
- បៀវត្សន៏ប្រចាំខែពី២៥០ដុល្លារទៅ៣០០ ដុល្លារនិងកំរៃជើងសារ(Commission) ដែលបានពីការលក់ផលិតផល
- ទទួលបាននូវការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញលក់បន្ថែម
- ក្រុមហ៊ុនមានរថយន្តសម្រាប់អ្នកលក់ចុះទីផ្សារ
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Accountant    016 303 738 kct.tile@gmail.com អាស័យដ្ឋាន, ដីឡូត៌លេខ 3 ផ្លូវហាណូយ សង្កាត់ ភ្នំពេញថ្មី ខ័ណ្ឌសែនសុខ ភ្នំពេញ។ 016 303 738

job title: Engineering Technician I - Electric and Automation
position: Engineering Technician I - Electric and Automation
Job Description:
Purpose of the role: 
Engineering Technicians will work independently and with other brewery personnel to perform preventative, predictive and routine maintenance tasks. 
They will do troubleshoot issues, repair failures of production and facilities equipment, and ensure maximum equipment efficiency and effectiveness. 
All tasks will be performed while supporting the policies, goals and objectives of the company.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities include the following. Other duties may be assigned.
- Repair and maintain all equipment of production.
- Perform work order repairs, inspections and adjustments.
- Fabrication and modification of new and existing equipment.
- Participates in plant safety, health and environmental, TPM programs.

Job Description: 
- Implement safety procedure during daily activities.
- Reporting Near Miss and unsafe condition.
- Execute work order related to safety in the fastest time in line with the priority and procedure.
- Improve team should be used. 
- Analyze the breakdown in daily base.
- Install, maintain, repair, overhaul, calibrate and test a Brewery equipment & instrumentations 
- Troubleshoot all machines and process controller hardware, maintains a functional knowledge of the operation of the system software and hardware.
- Make periodic preventative maintenance inspections of all machines and control systems. Diagnosing existing or potential trouble; cleans, lubricates, calibrates and adjusts as conditions indicate.
- Read and interpret wiring diagrams, drawings, and specifications in making installations or performing major repair work.
- TPM Methodologies for Spare part management, Energy & water saving initiative
- Implement Procedure, SOP & WI.
- All standards produced and related to shop floor has to be trained to production technician.
- Supervise progress & quality of work of contractors & packaging or brewing technician in conducting maintenance
- Create reports on activities during shift / BD / repair / Overhaul
- Analyze the report and give recommendation to superior for necessary actions for improvement.
- Actively involved as member / leader in Team, 5S, CILT, RCFA, Single even, Machine board, DCS.
Job Requirement:
Education and Work Experiences:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering Electric, Instrumentation, Automation or similar
- Fresh Graduate or with 1-year experience

Leadership Expectations:
- Ability to connect and build trust through authentically empathy and logic
- Ability to shape the future by thinking big and setting a clear strategy
- Ability to develop, grow and motivate our people
- Ability to set and deliver against ambitious targets by raising the bar and taking ownership for results
- Ability to lead by example, promoting and role modelling the Heineken Behaviors in everything we do

Technical Skills:
- TPM fundamentals (TBD)
- Guideline APM team route
- E- learnings + videos
- Supplier training
- External learning solutions
- Coaching by support group
- Machine Operation 
- Electrical Safety

Language Requirement:
- English: Good in Written and Spoken
Company Profile:
The HEINEKEN Company, the world's most international brewer who was formerly known as Cambodia Brewery Limited (CBL). The company was established in Cambodia in 1994 as a joint-venture between Asia Pacific Brewery Limited and Progress Import-Export Company, before becoming 100% HEINEKEN in 2014. 

A career with HEINEKEN offers great challenges combined with exciting opportunities to own and grow your career in line with your aspirations.

HEINEKEN has over 85,000 internationally diverse, dynamic, committed and entrepreneurial employees working in over 70 countries on over 300 brands.

HEINEKEN Cambodia offers several exciting packages including:
- Company Transportation (30 mins from PP)
- Healthy Lunch @our Canteen
- 13th month salary
- Various performance bonuses 
- Insurance plans (Personal Accident & Group Hospital & Surgical)
- Company clinic (with Certified doctors and nurse)
- Training & development programs
- Oversea Training and international assignment opportunities
- Personal Development Plan and more.

Interested candidates shall submit their Application through our Online Application:
careers.theheinekencompany.com/Cambodia/

or send CV & Cover Letter to: hrrecruitments@heineken.com

Head Office: Tiger Beer Street, Robos Angkagne Village, Sangkat Prek Eng, Khan Chbar Ompov, Phnom Penh
Tel: 096 776 6988
Contact Info: Contact Information Sopheak Prak  096 776 6988 hrrecruitments@heineken.com Tiger Beer Street, Robos Angkagne Village, Prek Eng, Chbar Ampov, Phnom Penh. 096 776 6988

-Installs, maintains, repairs, overhauls, calibrates and tests a Brewery equipments & instrumentations 
-Troubleshoots all machines and process controller hardware, maintains a functional knowledge of the operation of the system software and hardware.
-Makes periodic preventative maintenance inspections of all machines and control systems. Diagnosing existing or potential trouble; cleans, lubricates, calibrates and adjusts as conditions indicate.
-Reads and interprets wiring diagrams drawings, and specifications in making installations or performing major repair work.

-Implement Procedure, SOP & WI.
-All standards produced and related to shop floor has to be trained to production technician.
-Supervise progress & quality of work of contractors & packaging or brewing technician in conducting maintenance

-Create reports on activities during shift / BD / repair / Overhaul
-Analysing the report and give recommendation to superior for necessary actions for improvement.
Job Requirement:
Education and Work Experiences:
- Bachelor's Degree in mechanical engineering
- 1 years of work experiences in related fields
- Fresh graduates are welcomed to apply.

Leadership expectations: 
- Ability to connect and build trust through authentically empathy and logic
- Ability to shape the future by thinking big and setting a clear strategy
- Ability to develop, grow and motivate our people
- Ability to set and deliver against ambitious targets by raising the bar and taking ownership for results
- Ability to lead by example, promoting and role modelling the Heineken Behaviors in everything we do

Technical Skills:
- TPM fundamentals (TBD)
- Guideline APM team route
- E- learnings + videos
- Supplier training
- External learning solutions
- Coaching by support group

Language requirements:
- English: good in written and spoken
- Khmer: mother tongue

Job Description:
Purpose of the role:
The Facility Engineer organizes and supervises all 3rd party Contractors and/or Engineers required for the general upkeep and maintenance of all CBL Buildings, roads, drainage systems, lighting, fire alarms, ventilation, Air-conditioning, sewage systems, etc. The Facility Engineer assists the Chief Mechanic to set-up and continuously improve a maintenance system covering all CBL buildings and other infrastructure.  He can work independently and with other brewery personnel. The Facility Engineer can also work on projects related to buildings and infrastructure in the CBL premises. All tasks will be performed while supporting the policies, goals and objectives of the company. He participates in plant safety, health and energy savings, and participates or leads improvement teams.

Job Description:
1. Minimize service problems of buildings and/or infrastructure
- Problem analysis
- Contact/contract the relevant contractors
- Check and agree quotations together with purchasing specialists
- Supervise (civil and electrical and plumbing) contractors
- Accept and/or reject contractor works
- Organize periodic preventative maintenance and inspections of all electrical, cooling, ventilation, sewage, control systems, security cameras, fire alarms, etc.
2. Standard way of working is well implemented
- Assist Chief Mechanic to create and implement Procedures, SOP’s & WI’s.
3. Report submitted timely & correctly
- Create or request reports on all activities from contactors
- Analyze the report and give recommendation to superior for necessary actions for improvement
4. TPM
- Actively involved as member / leader in Team, 5S, CILT, RCFA
5. Clean and Hygienic working environment
- Implementing personal hygiene.
- Cleaning of working area and tools or supporting material.
6. continuous Improvement 
- Proactively conduct self-learning & development to increase competency level
- Continuously find ideas for improvement
7. Legal Compliance
- Ensure compliance to all local rules and regulations
- Ensure compliance to all Heineken rules and regulations
Job Requirement:
Education and Work Experiences:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering Mechanical/Electric/Automation/IT or similar
- Preferably 1 year of experience in similar job scope

Leadership Expectations:
- Ability to connect and build trust through authentically empathy and logic
- Ability to shape the future by thinking big and setting a clear strategy
- Ability to develop, grow and motivate our people
- Ability to set and deliver against ambitious targets by raising the bar and taking ownership for results
- Ability to lead by example, promoting and role modelling the Heineken Behaviors in everything we do

Technical Skills:
- Mechanical knowledge
- Electrical knowledge
- Construction knowledge
- Ventilation/Air-conditioning/drainage/sewage

Language Requirement:
- English: Good in Written and Spoken

Job Description:

- Prepare monthly tax and annual tax return

- Good command of Chinese language is preferable, English Language is a plus

- Creative and innovative mind

Company Profile:
CAMHR is Cambodia’s leading human resources and recruitment company, specializing in providing human capital resources and assets. Launched in 2009 by CAMHR INFORMATION (CAMBODIA) CO. LTD, we have grown from specializing in online recruitment to offline, sourcing employees of all standards for businesses and organizations across the country.

Job Description:
	Prepare, examine, and analyze accounting records, financial statements, and other financial reports to assess accuracy, completeness, and conformance to reporting and procedural standards.
	Improving business knowledge, perform business operation analysis, trends, costs, revenues, financial commitments, and obligations, to project future revenues and expenses or to provide advice
	Report to management regarding the accounting records and filling
	Establish tables of accounts, and assign entries to proper accounts
	Develop, maintain, and analyze budgets, preparing periodic reports that compare budgeted costs to actual costs
	Develop, implement, modify, and document recordkeeping and accounting systems, making use of current computer technology
	Assisting in prepare forms and manuals for accounting and bookkeeping and direct team work activities
	Survey operations to ascertain accounting needs and to recommend, develop, and maintain solutions to business and financial problems.
	Work as Internal Revenue Service agents to other departments
	Advise management about issues such as resource utilization, tax strategies and implantations, and the assumptions underlying budget forecasts
	Provide internal auditing services for businesses
	Investigate bankruptcies and other complex financial transactions and prepare reports summarizing the findings
	Knowledge about Cambodian taxes, preparing monthly and yearly tax returns, and taking necessary actions to meet tax requirements
	Assisting Management for coaching team on Accounting and Finance
	Other tasks required by Management
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor Degree in Finance, Business or other relevant fields
-	At least 3 years in Financial Management.
-	Possess strong analytical and critical thinking skills
-	Be able for coaching team on accounting and finance.
-	Be able to work under pressure and deadline.
-	Be able to analyze budgets, preparing periodic reports that compare budgeted costs to actual costs.
-	Knowledge in Cambodia taxes, yearly tax returns and tax requirements.

Job Description:
· Responsible for increasing revenue by achieving sales objectives in existing and new accounts
· Create and manage territory and account strategies to deliver on price and product mix objectives.
· Provide product recommendations, samples, technical support, pricing and service information on demand.
· Provide product quotes and actively utilize value-selling tools and skills.
· Uncover and assess customer needs and develop and execute Value Proposition   (Aligning Value).
· Demonstrate products and/or services and provide assistance in the best application of product and/or services.
· Proactively identify new accounts using screening techniques, referrals, and prospecting to potential customers within territory.
· Develop a thorough understanding of market conditions (e.g., current customers, potential customers, competitors) in assigned territory, and develop a strategy to achieve revenue goals.
· Conduct territory analysis and planning to enable appropriate allocation of time to accounts and customers.
· Responsible for securing and maintaining distribution of products and/or services and maintaining effective agreements.
· Use account management skills to plan and execute customer marketing/growth programs for customers.
· Creatively develop new applications for product lines.
· Channel or Key Accounts Specific: Responsible for selling to a designated channel.
· May identify new opportunities within the channel for potential business. Also responsible for needs analysis, development, negotiation, sale, delivery, and post sale services to a group of clients.
· Participate in territory planning, customer planning and territory reviews. Develop and present SWOT analysis and make recommendations on products and growth opportunities.
· Maintain customer profiles and supply agreements.
· Establish pricing programs and strategies. Secure optimum product positioning within target accounts.
· Provide exceptional customer experience for business partners and prospects to develop long-term business opportunities.
· Navigate complex problems and structures to determine the best solutions for customer needs.
· Collaborate with other business units to evaluate volume, identify trends, ensure quality, and monitor budgets.
Job Requirement: · Bachelor’s Degree preferred. Advanced language skills (spoken and written) in both Chinese and English (must have).· 5+ years applicable sales or related experience.· Demonstrated successful experience in a sales position that involved negotiating complex transactions with upper-level management positions or similar experience.·  Skilled in developing sales penetration and growth strategies at targeted accounts.· Proficient in assessing customer needs.· Proven negotiation skills/experience.· Excellent financial skills and business acumen.· Skilled in conducting territory analysis and planning.· Able to work independently with little supervision.· Broad-based understanding of how to manage territory business.· Skilled in communicating effectively with all levels of management on complex business issues.· Skilled in preparing professional written proposals.· Mathematical skills: Skilled in calculating figures and amounts such as discounts, invoice totals, percentages, bonuses,         .           Thorough understanding of product and technical information.· Excellent customer service skills.· Excellent oral, written and presentation skills.· Understanding of applicable computer systems, such as Microsoft Office· Notes, and function specific software.· Excellent ability to work as part of a team.
Company Profile: Avery Dennison (NYSE: AVY) is a global materials science company specializing in the design and manufacture of a wide variety of labeling and functional materials.The company’s products, which are used in nearly every major industry, include pressure-sensitive materials for labels and graphic applications; tapes and other bonding solutions for industrial, medical, and retail applications; tags, labels and embellishments for apparel; and radio frequency identification (RFID) solutions serving retail apparel and other markets. Headquartered in Glendale, California, the company employs more than 30,000 employees in over 50 countries. Reported sales in 2019 were $7.1 billion

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
ABOUT YOUR ROLE :				
The Warehouse Team Leader ensures to supply material to production (both physical and in-Oracle system) timely and do finished good delivery to customer ontime everyday as request date. This individual leads warehouse team on daily activities effectively to meet performance requirements.

1. Material handling and Delivery:
• Monitor and lead all daily activities at WH team to ensure no any case that supply late or lack of material to production and receive their complain  
• Ensure FIFO and all SOPs are strictly following by team
• Organize, arrange for goods in RM areas with tidy, clean and easy to control, easy to find
• Separate, well identify and good monitor for RMs with slow moving, obsolete or write off
• Set up, schedule and maintain 5S activity at controlling areas
• Monitor, maintain safety conditions at RM areas both WH #A and #B as well as always remind staff to follow EHS requirement in daily activities
• Ensure FG delivery activities are maintained, performed with no any mistake relating to wrong customer, wrong SO … and receive their complain 
• Monthly report for goods with quality issue are returned to WH
• Monthly ship out FG at WH to meet company sales billing at cut-off day
• Other tasks assigned by Manager

2. Internal cycle count and company stock take :
• Plan, arrange and conduct cycle count in daily/weekly as scheduling and report to Supervisor
• Organize, arrange and follow stock take schedule to ensure the counting happened successfully with high result and high accuracy 
• Immediately report any issues to Supervisor/Manager for awareness and solving 

3. Document keeping and policy compliance :
• Ensure all WH documents are kept following company policy as well as easy to find, track when needed 
• Ensure WH team strictly comply all company policies, procedures 

4. Safety and environment: 
• Comply with the safety and environment policy; understand and adhere to the safety and hygiene standards in the working area.
• Practice 5S methodology at the work place.
• Implement ""Near Miss"" in accordance with the requirements on industrial hygiene and safety standards within the factory zone.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s Degree required.• 4+ years in garment factory /Label Printing factory or related experience.• Excellent analytical, mathematical, organizational, verbal and written communication skills and detail-oriented. • Ability to interface with cross-functional groups to define and execute overall requirements.• Ability to conduct research, prepare comprehensive reports and present complex statistical information in a clear and succinct fashion. • Ability to work well with all levels of management and employees. • General Supply Chain, Materials Management, and Logistics knowledge.• Familiarity in process documentation and improvement.• Understanding of applicable computer systems, such as Microsoft Office, Lotus Notes and function specific software.• Excellent project management skills.• Green Belt or ELS certification preferred.

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.

Job Description:
Duties and Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain Internal Control system of CMIC (Policy, Methodology, Procedure, Tools) with international and professional practice and standard.
- Ensure the internal control procedure are following the company rule, guidelines and exchange best practices within all department.
- To carry out internal control review with all department from end-to-end process, to assist them to identify the gaps that exist and produce action plan.
- Maintain internal control system to be sustain at all levels
- Coordinate with Internal audit team and follow up audit recommendation and improvement actions
- Educate all employees to have internal control self-awareness
- Proper SoD setup as good business practice and absolutely required in today‘s environment we operate
- Other tasks assigned by manager

Deadline:	31st January 2020
Shortlist:	Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree of Business Administration or Accounting, Economics or related field 
- At least three years’ experience in project management, internal/external audit, business risk assessment, business process consulting or related field.
- Knowledgeable in operational risk assessment and internal control
- Experiences in multi-national company
- Language: Good English written and spoken , Computer proficient in Ms Office, SAP is an advantage

Job Description:
- Support Regional head of compliance with tender preparation and submissions to different regulatory bodies. (Thailand, Philippines, Singapore).
- Clients and Supplier risk assessment
- Client and vendor contract drafting, amendment and review
- Review of all internal legal templates
- Develop and implement a streamlined and systems driven process flow for Compliance/Legal;
- Monitor regulatory changes and adjust internal processes to accommodate and ensure compliance
- Interprets complex license and agreements
- Responsible for handling escalated customer queries, including C-level customers
- Analyses company data, and follows external news to discover customers that represent a high risk /high value likelihood of over using licenses
- Responsible for creating standard operating procedures including updating with process improvements.
- Responsible for monthly reporting including pipeline engagement status, next steps and potential strategies to multiple stakeholders
- Participates in special AML reviews, projects and training efforts, as required.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in business, finance, accounting, law and related field or equivalent experience.
- Strong interpersonal, organizations, communications, analytical and project management skills.
- Thorough knowledge of products, services, operations and systems and extensive dealing with laws, regulations and regulatory agencies related to assigned areas.
- Proficiency with personal computers and pertinent mainframe systems and software packages.
Company Profile: Fincy is a technology-focused company that is established regionally across Asia with its base operations in Singapore. Our local operating company in Cambodia is licensed under the National Bank of Cambodia and is working closely with the NBC to reach the company’s ambitions of becoming a full-fledged FinTech powerhouse. With our strong capital base, network and technological capabilities, we create our own startups to boost the fintech market in the countries that we are operating in. We pride ourselves to be a key participant in smart city development, fintech solution provider and fostering a community that is key to nurturing a dynamic and adaptive smart city ecosystem. GBCI Ventures Plc will be the most innovative and complete cashless payment platform. We target to build a product around the consumer and our partners. Our list of products and services incorporate merchant e-payment services, local remittance, overseas money transfer, staff payroll services and money

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
	Prepare management, regional, group and regulatory reports accurately and on timely manner
	Monitor Management Information system and other systems in Finance Department that required by MIS reporting
	Take immediate actions in solving problems occurring with data reporting from LAS system
	Reconciliate business data for accurate information
	Consolidate business information from different functions for daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, half-yearly and annual reports
	Analyze business trends and provide commentary of the changes
	Obtain information from relevant functions/departments for reporting purposes
	Assisting in budget and business planning, as required
	Collaborate with all functions in the company to establish strong inter-company networks which will facilitate the information gathering process to be more effective and efficient
	Assist team in dealing with external auditors as part of compulsory annual audit
	Engage actively in problem solving, as required
	Support teams and other functions on projects, as required
	Assist in team coaching on existing report requirement with care and understanding
	Work closely with line manager to obtain better business understanding for commentary purpose
	Be alert to any changes in trends and skeptical of unusual business information obtained
	Assist in ad-hoc requests from other functions, LM, ExCo, regulator, regional and group
Job Requirement:
Experience/Skill:
	Experience at least three years in Finance, Auditing, or equivalents; ACCA and CAT is preferable.
	Understand Accounting standards and Tax matters
	Possess strong analytic skills, report/administrative writing skills, audit, general math skills, and statistical analysis
	Have strong excel, numerical, written, and verbal communication skills
	Familiar with Sun System is preferable
	A fast learner and critical thinker

Knowledge:
	University graduated or equivalent major in Economics, Business Administration, Accounting, or Finance
	Able to build trust and rapport with all levels of the organization
	Be proactive in delivering the assigned works with quality and timely manner;
	Excellence spoken and written English.
Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
Contact Info: Contact Information PCLA Recruitment HR Manager 087333908 pclarecruitment@prudential.com.kh Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 087333908

IG Trading Group, is 1 of the company under IG International Group which establish since 2012, operated in FMCG segment since 2017 and granted Exclusive Distributorship from DANA Dairy Group from France in late of 2019. Our core business value is looking for the best quality product to build a strong brand heritage for the mass consumer segments in Cambodia Market.
Currently, in order to strengthen our business operation and build up our strong distribution channel, IG Trading Group is looking for the dynamic candidate to join the challenge and growth with us for the above position.

Job Description: • Review, setup and re-enforce standard finance & accounting procedures & policies.• Manage daily operation in accounting & tax department• Monitor, analyze accounting data and provide recommendations• Banks reconciliation management• Prepare monthly financial report and ensure the accurate and correctness• Prepare monthly and annual tax report• Ensure that no significant issues/finding from tax audit for bank accounting transactions.• Liaise with external auditor and tax agents• Support all tax operational activities internal and external• Assist tax on verification and processing of tax return filing (VAT, withholding tax, prepayment on profit tax, annual tax and patent tax), • Regularly update tax guideline/Practice/Parkas to relevant departments.• Provide practical recommendation on good tax practice.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor or Master degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field• More than 05 year experience in finance, accounting & tax work • Good knowledge of general principle of accounting and Cambodia tax law • Hand-on experience with accounting software (SAP, Sage, QuickBooks,..)• Have good proficiency Microsoft Office• Have good command in English• Have good leadership skills• Good interpersonal, communication and problem solving skill• Honest, positive attitude, good team player* HOW TO APPLYInterest candidate can send CV & certificates to:• Email: jobs@igtrade.asia• Address: No. 163 Street 192, S/K Toeuk Laak 3, Khan Toulkork, Phnom Penh.• For more info, please contact 078 777 229

job title: មន្ត្រីសវនកម្មផ្ទៃក្នុង
position: មន្ត្រីសវនកម្មផ្ទៃក្នុង
Job Description:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យលើការអនុវត្តគោលនយោបាយនិងសេចក្ដីសម្រេចនានារបស់ស្ថាប័ន ទាំងនៅក្នុងស្នាក់ការនិងនៅតាមភូមិប្រតិបត្តិការ
- ស្វែងរកភាពខុសប្រក្រតីនៃសាច់ប្រាក់បុគ្គលិកប្រតិបត្តិការដែលបានផ្ដល់ជូនអតិថិជន និងការប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជនត្រឡប់មកវិញរបស់បុគ្គលិកប្រតិបត្តិការ។
-ត្រួតពិនិត្យសមតុល្យសាច់ប្រាក់នៅក្នុងទូរដែក និងនៅក្នុងធនាគាររបស់សាខា -បង្ហាញរបាយការណ៍ដែលប្រមូលបានមកអោយប្រធានសាខា ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រធានងសាខាទទួលស្គាល់មុនផ្ញើរមកកាន់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់ខ្លួន។
-ចូលរួមផ្ដល់យោបល់ក្នុងការរៀបចំនីតិវិធីគ្រប់គ្រងហានិភ័យលើអាជីវកម្មលើផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
-ត្រូវធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ជូនប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។						-បំពេញការងារមួយចំនួនទៀតដែលផ្ដល់អោយដោយប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់របស់ខ្លួន។
Job Requirement:
- ជានិស្សិតដែលកំពុងរៀននៅមហាវិទ្យាល័យចាប់ពីឆ្នាំទី២ ឬចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ឬច្បាប់ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រមានតម្លៃស្មើ
-ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក Computer ពិសេស Ms. Word និង Excel
-អាចចុះការងារតាមភូមិនិងតាមសាខា
-ត្រូវមានឆន្ទះច្បាស់់លាស់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ
-ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់។
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   015 910 333 / 087 487 999 hrkrepofinance@gmail.com ស្នាក់ការកណ្តាលរបស់គ.រ.រ. ដែលមាន អាសយដ្ឋានផ្ទះលេខ៦អា ភូមិត្នោតជ្រុំ៤ សង្កាត់បឹងទំពុន២ ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ 015 910 333 / 087 487 999

job title: មន្ត្រីឥណទានCredit officer ជាច្រើននាក់($260-$400)
position: មន្ត្រីឥណទានCredit officer ជាច្រើននាក់($260-$400)
Job Description:
**ទីតាំងមាន៖  សាខា ក្រុងតាខ្មៅ 5នាក់,    សាខា ចោមចៅ 5នាក់,    សាខា ផ្សារត្រាំខ្នារ 10នាក់,    សាខា ផ្សារថ្នល់ទទឹង 1នាក់។

1.ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាននៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
2.ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយជាមួយប្រជាពលរដ្ឋក្នុងតំបន់ ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
3.ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់អតិថិជនតាមផែនការរបស់ស្ថាបនដាក់ឲ្យ 
4.សិក្សាសំណើសុំខ្ចីប្រាក់ របស់អតិថិជនផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី ជូនអតិ ថិជន ( បើកប្រាក់ជូនអតិជន ) ។
5.ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជន មកទូទាត់ជាមួយបេឡាធិការ ។
6.ដោះស្រាយជាមួយ អតិថិជនដែលបង់ប្រាក់យឺត ។
7.រាយការណ៍ នឹងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានសាខា ។
8.ការងារមួយចំនួនទៀតដែលផ្តល់ដោយប្រធានសាខា ។
Job Requirement:
1សិស្សដែលប្រឡងជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប នឹងសិស្សនិស្សិតដែលកំពុង តែសិក្សា ឬបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សានៅតាម សាកលវិទ្យាល័យ ។
2.ត្រូមានកាយសប្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ។
3មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ នឹងមានឆន្ទះបំពេញការងាររបស់ខ្លួន។	
4.ជាមនុស្សមានភាពបត់បែននិងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើ លើការងាររបស់ខ្លួន ។
5.ជាមនុស្សដែលមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយអ្នកដ៏ទៃ។
6.មានក្រមសិលធម៌  នឹងមានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ។


** សំណងទូទាត់នឹងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបាន
1.ទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សចាប់ពី (260$-400$) ។
2.ទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម ថ្ងៃបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ នឹងភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ
3. ទទួលបានអាហារូបករណ៍១០០%ពីសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ 
ដែលខ្លួនកំពុងសិក្សា។
4.ផ្តល់ជូនកន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ ថ្លៃទឹក ភ្លើងដោយឥតបង់ប្រាក់
5.ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ២៤ ម៉ោង និងសុខភាព។
6. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្តលើស្នាដៃការងារដែលសម្រេចបាន

8.ឱកាសចាប់យកតំណែងនានាពីក្រេប៉ូ ។
9.មានប្រាក់កម្ចីសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក ដែលបម្រើការក្នុង ក្រេប៉ូ។

Job Description:
• សំរេចអោយបាននូវផែនការលក់ប្រចាំខែដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានកំណត់ Hit Company monthly target is a must
• ត្រូវបើកហាងថ្មីជាប្រចាំដែលតំរូវអោយពីអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង Open new outlets as per targeted by direct supervisor
• រៀបចំនូវផែនការលក់ ផែនការចុះជួបម៉ូយ ជាប្រចាំខែ Prepared sales plan, call plan in monthly basis
• កសាងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយនឹង ម្ចាស់ហាង Build strong relationship with outlets owner
•ទទួល ខុសត្រូវទាំងស្រុងជាមួយនឹងទំហំទឹកប្រាក់ដែលបានលក់ដោយ ជំពាក់ Responsible and manage account receivable
• ត្រូវតែធ្វើអោយបាននូវការដាក់តាំងផលិតផលអោយងាយរក, ងាយចាប់បាន Manage visibility and availability in all stores.
• គ្រប់គ្រងនិង ត្រួតពិនិត្យនូវបរិមាណ ស្តុកដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានដាក់អោយ ដោយធានាមិនអោយមានការបាត់បង់ Manage and control Inventory and make sure there is not any loose
Job Requirement:
• បេក្ខភាពជានិស្សិតដែលកំពុងសិក្សា នៅឆ្នាំទី ៣, ៤ ឬបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ផ្នែកពាណិជ្ជកម្ម
Candidate of Bachelor’s degree Graduated students in Business Administration/Studies, Commerce, Management or a related field. 
• បេក្ខជនត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការរៀននូវអ្វីដែលខ្លួនចង់ចេះ និងថ្មីៗ (ប្រសិនបើមានបទពិសោធន៍កាន់តែប្រសើរ) we required willing to learn candidate and dynamic, 1 year experience is a plus 
• ត្រូវមានការយល់ដឹងនិង ឥរិយាបថ នៃការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងជាមួយអតិថិជនបានល្អ ability to build a good communication with customer.
• ហ៊ានទទួលយកនូវចំណេះដឹងបន្ថែមនិងថ្មីៗ ability to learn new things.
• ចេះគិតលេខនិងអានអក្សរខ្មែរស្ទាត់ជំនាញ និងអាចអានភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានខ្លះ ability to calculate and read Khmer fluently and know how to read English.
• ចេះដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាដោយសន្តិវិធី problem solving skills
• ចេះធ្វើផែនការនិងចាត់ចែងការងារដែលបានកំណត់ដោយប្រធានផ្ទាល់ Strong planning and organization skills

Company Profile:
ក្រុមហ៊ុន IG Trading Group ជាមួយក្រុមហ៊ុនបុត្រសម្ព័ន្វមួយ របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន IG International Group ដែលបានបង្កើតឡើងតាំងតែ ឆ្នាំ ២០១២។ក្រុមហ៊ុនបានផ្តោតទៅលើការលក់ផលិតផលដែលស្ថិតនៅក្នុងវិស័យ ផលិផលប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃតាំងតែពីឆ្នាំ ២០១៧ និងទទួលបានសិទ្ធិជាអ្នកចែកចាយផ្តាច់មុខ ពីក្រុមហ៊ុន ដាណា ឌែរី គ្រុប នៅចុងឆ្នាំ ២០១៩។ គុណតំលៃជាមូលដ្ឋានរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន IG Trading Group គឺស្វែងរកនូវផលិតផលដែលប្រកបដោយគុណភាពខ្ពស់ ដើម្បីធ្វើការពង្រឹងនូវកិត្យានុភាពនៃម៉ាកសញ្ញានៃផលិតផលនីមួយៗសំរាប់ចំនែកទីផ្សារទូទៅនៅក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជា។ បច្ចុប្បន្នដើម្បីបង្កើននិងពង្រឹងនូវប្រព័ន្ធចែកចាយ ក្រុមហ៊ុនកំពុងស្វែងរកនូវបេក្ខជនដែលមានភាពក្លាហាន អំណត់និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការប្រកួត ប្រជែងក្នុងការសែ្វងរកឱកាសរីកចំរើនជាមួយក្រុមហ៊ុន ក្នុងការបំពេញតួនាទីដែលមានប្រកាសជ្រើសរើសខាងលើ។
IG Trading Group, is 1 of the company under IG International Group which establish since 2012, operated in FMCG segment since 2017 and granted Exclusive Distributorship from DANA Dairy Group from France in late of 2019. Our core business value is looking for the best quality product to build a strong brand heritage for the mass consumer segments in Cambodia Market.
Currently, in order to strengthen our business operation and build up our strong distribution channel, IG Trading Group is looking for the dynamic candidate to join the challenge and growth with us for the above position.
