Job Description:
Job Summary: 
Assist Sales Executive and support sales team in order to push and hit the target

Duties and Responsibilities:

- Prepare weekly and monthly outlets visit schedule and visit customer to push sales volume
- Prepare sales plan and listing process for current and new products
- Learn product knowledge of current and new products
- Report and update competitor activities (price, display, promotion, survey, new items)
- Keep in touch with key account sales volume, display, and other process
- Find and open new potential customers in the areas and channels
- Check and update products status in warehouses
- Report daily plan and activities to sales Executive
- And other duties to be assigned by upper level.
Job Requirement:
* SKILLS AND EXPERIENCES:
-At least high Scholl certificate
-Computer (Ms. Words and excel, internet and email)
-Good communication, interpersonal presentation skill;
-Good in Chinese speaking, and medium in writing
-High confident and responsible
Company Profile:
LSH Cambodia was estabished in February 1999 to tap into the emerging market in Cambodia.

Since then, we have steadily built its reputation into one of the leading Food Importer and Distributor in the Kingdom of Cambodia.

Over the past years, the Company, with its perseverance, hard work, and committed team, has continued to invest in equipment and storage facilities, manpower training and a strong market presence to become an essential player in the market.

Job Description:
- Daily stock control (stock in & stock out).
- Make daily, monthly, and yearly stock reports.
- Monthly and annual stock count.
- Receiving and verifying from the purchase order list to purchaser.
- Reporting loss, damage, and any such difference to the director.
- Supervise and daily update stock inventories of showrooms.
- Supervise on product’s manufacture date and expiration date, then report to the director.
- Keeping records and maintaining cycle count of inventories in stock.
- Organizing all the goods in stock incorrect order and well.
- Ensure that the stock key always with you and lock it after leaving.
- Ensure that every item in & out of stock, you must know all.
- Other duties assigned by the General Manager and Director.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's Degree in Finance & Banking or related fields.
- At least 3 years of working experience in the stock controller.
- Age from 18 – 30 years old.
- Male
- Good English (speak, write, read, and listen).
- Computer literate (Ms. Office)
- Proper appearance.
- Honest and hard-working.
- Self-organized and Proactive.
- Confidence and can problem solving
- Patient and Flexible.
- Experience from a restaurant or hotel is a priority.
Company Profile:
Sushi Tei is one of the largest Japanese restaurant chains in Singapore and Asia, serving up authentic Japanese cuisine to food aficionados. Founded in 1994 with a Japanese as one of the founding members, Sushi Tei aims to offer the most authentic and satisfying experience in Japanese cuisine. Its unique blend of fresh and original dishes combines the best of Japanese authenticity, and as such has become a popular taste across the Asian Pacific region with more than 51 outlets serving up quality Japanese cuisine to customers every day.
   With an unwavering commitment towards quality, Sushi Tei has grown from its humble beginnings in Holland Village in Singapore to an impressive chain of outlets all over the country, and across Australia, China, Indonesia, Malaysia, and Brunai Darussalam, with over 2,000 employees. Sushi Tei is now expanding in Cambodia and this is indisputably the right time to carve your career with us.  We top the people’s choice in Japanese restaurants regularly and we contend for more awards actively.  At all times, we are endeavoring to achieve more success in future, looking at expanding our chain all over the world and gaining global recognition.
   With our rapid growth and expansion, we are seeking dynamic, vibrant, highly enthusiastic & motivated individual to be part of our team. We are welcome those who have a desire and passion for Food & Beverage industry to join us for the following position.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  093 33 22 99 recruit.sushiteicambodia@gmail.com #131, st. Preah Monireth (217) Corner of st. 310, Village 10, Sangkat Toul Svay Prey 2, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh 093 33 22 99

Job Description:
Vacancy Type:Work Experience::
- Create HTML pages and using tools of graphic design application.
- Create dynamic page using PHP.
The number of wanted Web Designer: 5 people

Company Profile: CITA (Cambodia Information Technology Association) is established in 2007, located in Phnom Penh and has business address at villa #44, Str. 162, Sangkat Phsa Depo 1, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. CITA provides IT services such as: Website Design Web-Application development (Software), IT Maintenance, Web-Hosting & Domain Name Registration, Graphic Design, and related services. Up to now CITA has it experiences in IT services more than 5 year go and having more than 300 clients in Cambodia.

Company Profile:
COGETEL Ltd. (ONLINE) is the leading ISP and broadband provider in the country; established in July 1997 by Telstra
Cambodia as Bigpond Cambodia – the first commercial Internet Service Provider in the country. In 2002, Cogetel Limited acquired the business from Telstra marking the beginning of its ADSL service and its new brand name – ONLINE.

ONLINE subsequently brought in WiMAX, Long-range WiFi, and Fiber Optic to increase its range of last miles technology to meet any need of its customers.

ONLINE strives to deliver products and services that are tailored to its customers’ Internet technology needs, easily understood and used, delivered with warmth, knowledge and experience throughout the years. Supported by its core drive of keeping people in touch with their world; ONLINE always brings innovative products and services to Cambodia, thus keeping Cambodia abreast with latest technologies worldwide.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department HR Manager 016672267 jobs@cogetel.com.kh Phnom Penh #60, Monivong BLvd, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 016672267

Job Description:
Accountant
‒ Preparing invoice for expense. 
‒ Monthly/yearly tax declares. 
‒ Banks reconcile. 
‒ Make sure all invoice is corrected and proper sign from the manager. 
‒ F&B Stock controlling & checking. 
‒ Conducted the fixed Assets control to make sure all fixed asset stay at the right location, department, and label then do the report for Depreciation 
‒ Bank statements or Bank deposit. 
‒ Do the report for wash foods, expired,
‒ Other tasks required by Supervisor.
Job Requirement:
Accountant
‒ Female only
‒ At least 1 year of experience relevant to the Restaurant/Hotel sector. 
‒ Good in English (Writing and Speaking). 
‒ Can use QuickBooks Accounting/Database or other accounting software. 
‒ Highly motivated
‒ be flexible and responsible
‒ Honest and hardworking

Company Profile:
Sushi Tei is one of the largest Japanese restaurant chains in Singapore and Asia, serving up authentic Japanese cuisine to food aficionados. Founded in 1994 with a Japanese as one of the founding members, Sushi Tei aims to offer the most authentic and satisfying experience in Japanese cuisine. Its unique blend of fresh and original dishes combines the best of Japanese authenticity, and as such has become a popular taste across the Asian Pacific region with more than 51 outlets serving up quality Japanese cuisine to customers every day.
   With an unwavering commitment towards quality, Sushi Tei has grown from its humble beginnings in Holland Village in Singapore to an impressive chain of outlets all over the country, and across Australia, China, Indonesia, Malaysia, and Brunai Darussalam, with over 2,000 employees. Job Description:
-	Security and safety of the warehouse premises to prevent from theft, pilferage, damage, contamination and misallocation.
-	Responsible for the cost effectiveness of the warehousing and logistics for the total operations.
-	Ensure SOPs are properly implemented across each roles and responsibilities in the warehouse.
-	Lead all personnel working in the warehouse/distribution center to achieve the KRA (Key Result Areas) of the department and company.
-	Manage the movement of products/equipment/materials within the warehouse in accordance with policy and procedure, and in compliance with the Cambodian laws and regulations.
-	Manage the disposal of all the damage & expired products and handling of Counterfeit products and coordinate with concern department.
-	Responsible to analysis, report the managing department performance/ concern as well as develop and propose for any improvement plan to build a productive and efficient and healthy working environment during management meeting and management review.
-	Ensure that all the department managing subordinators are properly equipped, inform and train for their assign job function.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor/Master degree of any related course to Logistics Management.
-	Preferably with at least 3 experience in warehousing , 1 year experience in Managerial position.
-	Good communication skills, English Language comprehension. 
-	Knowledge of computer (Microsoft office, Email, and Internet).
-	Honest, patient, flexible and open to changes in procedures.
-	Can manage staff under supervised.
-	Be able to manage works and meet deadline.
-	Ability to work quickly and thoroughly when under pressure.

 At least 7 years’ experience in sales, marketing or related field
